cobblemon.move.morningsun.desc: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.
cobblemon.move.mortalspin.desc: Пользователь выполняет атаку вращением, что также может устранить эффекты таких приёмов, как Сжатие, Связывание и Семена-пиявки. Это также отравляет противников.
cobblemon.move.mountaingale.desc: Пользователь бросает в цель гигантские куски льда, чтобы нанести урон. Это также может заставить цель вздрогнуть.
cobblemon.move.mudbomb.desc: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.
cobblemon.move.muddywater.desc: The user attacks by shooting muddy water at opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their accuracy.
cobblemon.move.mudshot.desc: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat.
cobblemon.move.mudslap.desc: The user hurls mud in the target’s face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.
cobblemon.move.mudsport.desc: The user kicks up mud on the battlefield. This weakens Electric-type moves for five turns.
cobblemon.move.multiattack.desc: Окутывая себя мощной энергией, пользователь наносит урон цели. Тип этого приёма меняется в зависимости от типа диска памяти, который держит пользователь.
cobblemon.move.mysticalfire.desc: Пользователь атакует, выдыхая особый горячий огонь. Это также понижает Спец. Атаку цели.
cobblemon.move.mysticalpower.desc: Пользователь атакует, излучая таинственную силу. Это также повышает Спец. Атаку пользователя.
cobblemon.move.nastyplot.desc: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. This sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
cobblemon.move.naturalgift.desc: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines the move’s type and power.
cobblemon.move.naturepower.desc: This attack makes use of nature’s power. Its effects vary depending on the user’s environment.
cobblemon.move.naturesmadness.desc: Пользователь наносит удар по цели со всей яростью природы. Это уменьшает ОЗ цели вдвое.
cobblemon.move.needlearm.desc: The user attacks by wildly swinging its thorny arms. This may also make the target flinch.
cobblemon.move.neverendingnightmare.desc: Глубоко укоренившаяся злоба, вызванная Z-Силой пользователя, захватывает цель. Сила зависит от исходного приёма.
cobblemon.move.nightdaze.desc: The user lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at its target. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.
cobblemon.move.nightmare.desc: A sleeping target sees a nightmare that inflicts some damage every turn.
cobblemon.move.nightshade.desc: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.
cobblemon.move.nightslash.desc: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.nobleroar.desc: Letting out a noble roar, the user intimidates the target and lowers its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
cobblemon.move.noretreat.desc: Этот приём повышает все показатели пользователя, но не позволяет ему уйти на замену или сбежать.
cobblemon.move.noxioustorque.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
cobblemon.move.nuzzle.desc: Пользователь атакует, прижимая свои электрифицированные щёки к цели. Это также парализует цель.
cobblemon.move.oblivionwing.desc: Пользователь поглощает ОЗ цели. Пользователь восстанавливает себе больше половины урона, полученной целью.
cobblemon.move.obstruct.desc: Этот приём позволяет пользователю защитить себя от всех атак. Вероятность провала возрастает при последовательном использовании. Прямой контакт резко понижает Защиту атакующего.
cobblemon.move.oceanicoperetta.desc: Примарина призывает огромное количество воды, используя свою Z-Силу, и атакует цель с полной силой.
cobblemon.move.octazooka.desc: The user attacks by spraying ink in the target’s face or eyes. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.
cobblemon.move.octolock.desc: Пользователь захватывает цель и не дает ей убежать. Этот приёма также понижает Защиту и Спец. Защиту цели каждый ход.
cobblemon.move.odorsleuth.desc: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.
cobblemon.move.ominouswind.desc: The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive wind. This may also raise all the user’s stats at once.
cobblemon.move.orderup.desc: Пользователь атакует с элегантным спокойствием. Если у пользователя во рту находится Тацугири, то этот приём повышает один из показателей пользователя в зависимости от формы Тацугири.
cobblemon.move.originpulse.desc: Пользователь атакует противника бесчисленными лучами света, сияющими насыщенным и ярким синим цветом.
cobblemon.move.outrage.desc: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.
cobblemon.move.overdrive.desc: Пользователь атакует противника, бренча на гитаре или бас-гитаре, вызывая огромное эхо и сильную вибрацию.
cobblemon.move.overheat.desc: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
cobblemon.move.painsplit.desc: The user adds its HP to the target’s HP, then equally shares the combined HP with the target.
cobblemon.move.paraboliccharge.desc: The user attacks everything around it. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by those hit.
cobblemon.move.partingshot.desc: Прощальной угрозой пользователь понижает Атаку и Спец. Атаку цели. Затем он меняется местами с ожидающим Покемоном из команды.
cobblemon.move.payback.desc: The user stores power, then attacks. If the user moves after the target, this attack’s power will be doubled.
cobblemon.move.payday.desc: Монеты бросаются в цель, чтобы нанести урон. Деньги зарабатываются после битвы.
cobblemon.move.peck.desc: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.
cobblemon.move.perishsong.desc: Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns, unless it switches out of battle.
cobblemon.move.petalblizzard.desc: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and attacks everything around it.
cobblemon.move.petaldance.desc: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.
cobblemon.move.phantomforce.desc: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.
cobblemon.move.photongeyser.desc: Пользователь атакует цель столбом света. Этот приём наносит или физический, или специальный урон в зависимости от того, какой из этих показателей у пользователя выше.
cobblemon.move.pikapapow.desc: Чем больше Пикачу любит своего Тренера, тем сильнее становится этот приём. Он никогда не промахивается.
cobblemon.move.pinmissile.desc: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.
cobblemon.move.plasmafists.desc: Пользователь атакует электрически заряженными кулаками. Этот приём меняет приёмы Нормального типа на Электрический.
cobblemon.move.playnice.desc: Пользователь и цель становятся друзьями, и цель теряет желание сражаться. Это понижает Атаку цели.
cobblemon.move.playrough.desc: Пользователь атакует, грубо играясь с целью. Это также может понизить Атаку цели.
cobblemon.move.pluck.desc: The user pecks the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.
cobblemon.move.poisonfang.desc: The user bites the target with toxic fangs. This may also leave the target badly poisoned.
cobblemon.move.poisongas.desc: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the face of opposing Pokémon, poisoning those it hits.
cobblemon.move.poisonjab.desc: The target is stabbed with a tentacle, arm, or the like steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.
cobblemon.move.poisonpowder.desc: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.
cobblemon.move.poisonsting.desc: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.
cobblemon.move.poisontail.desc: The user hits the target with its tail. This may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.pollenpuff.desc: Пользователь атакует врага взрывающимся облаком пыльцы. Если цель является союзником, то вместо этого он даёт ему облако пыльцы, которое восстанавливает его ОЗ.
cobblemon.move.poltergeist.desc: Пользователь атакует, контролируя предмет цели. Этот приём не сработает, если цель не держит предмет.
cobblemon.move.populationbomb.desc: Друзья пользователя собираются в толпу, чтобы провести комбо-атаку, которая атакует цель от одного до десяти раз подряд.
cobblemon.move.pounce.desc: Пользователь атакует, бросаясь на цель. Это также понижает Скорость цели.
cobblemon.move.pound.desc: Цель бьют длинным хвостом, передней лапой и тому подобными.
cobblemon.move.powder.desc: Пользователь покрывает цель горючим порошком. Если цель использует приём Огненного типа, порошок взрывается и наносит цели урон.
cobblemon.move.powdersnow.desc: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. This may also freeze opposing Pokémon.
cobblemon.move.powergem.desc: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.
cobblemon.move.powershift.desc: Пользователь меняет местами свою Атаку и Защиту.
cobblemon.move.powersplit.desc: The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target.
cobblemon.move.powerswap.desc: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with the target.
cobblemon.move.powertrick.desc: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack stat with its Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.powertrip.desc: Пользователь хвастается своей силой и атакует цель. Чем выше показатели пользователя, тем сильнее этот приём.
cobblemon.move.poweruppunch.desc: Повторяющиеся удары по противникам делают кулаки пользователя более сильными. Попадание по цели повышает Атаку.
cobblemon.move.powerwhip.desc: The user violently whirls its vines, tentacles, or the like to harshly lash the target.
cobblemon.move.precipiceblades.desc: Пользователь атакует противника, проявляя силу земли в виде страшных каменных клинков.
cobblemon.move.present.desc: The user attacks by giving the target a gift with a hidden trap. It restores HP sometimes, however.
cobblemon.move.prismaticlaser.desc: Пользователь стреляет мощными лазерами, используя силу призмы. Пользователь не может атаковать в следующем ходу.
cobblemon.move.protect.desc: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
cobblemon.move.psybeam.desc: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may also leave the target confused.
cobblemon.move.psychic.desc: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
cobblemon.move.psychicfangs.desc: Пользователь атакует, кусая цель своими психическими способностями. Этот приём также может разрушать барьеры, такие как Световой экран и Отражение.
cobblemon.move.psychicterrain.desc: Этот приём защищает Покемонов на земле от приоритетных приёмов и усиливает приёмы Психического типа на пять ходов.
cobblemon.move.psychoboost.desc: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
cobblemon.move.psychocut.desc: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.psychoshift.desc: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status conditions to the target.
cobblemon.move.psychup.desc: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.
cobblemon.move.psyshieldbash.desc: Окутывая себя психической энергией, пользователь наносит удар по цели. Это также повышает Защиту пользователя.
cobblemon.move.psyshock.desc: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.
cobblemon.move.psystrike.desc: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.
cobblemon.move.psywave.desc: The target is attacked with an odd psychic wave. The attack varies in intensity.
cobblemon.move.pulverizingpancake.desc: Z-Сила раскрывает истинные способности Снорлакса. Покемон энергично двигает своим огромным телом и атакует цель с полной силой.
cobblemon.move.punishment.desc: The more the target has powered up with stat changes, the greater the move’s power.
cobblemon.move.purify.desc: Пользователь лечит статусные эффекты цели. Если приём проходит успешно, он также восстанавливает ОЗ пользователя.
cobblemon.move.pursuit.desc: The power of this attack move is doubled if it’s used on a target that’s switching out of battle.
cobblemon.move.pyroball.desc: Пользователь атакует, поджигая небольшой камень и запуская его в виде огненного шара в цель. Это также может обжечь цель.
cobblemon.move.quash.desc: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.
cobblemon.move.quickattack.desc: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.
cobblemon.move.quickguard.desc: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves.
cobblemon.move.quiverdance.desc: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. This boosts the user’s Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.
cobblemon.move.rage.desc: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.
cobblemon.move.ragefist.desc: Пользователь преобразует свою ярость в энергию для атаки. Чем больше раз пользователь попадал под удары, тем больше сила этого приёма.
cobblemon.move.ragepowder.desc: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opposing Pokémon aim only at the user.
cobblemon.move.ragingbull.desc: Пользователь толкается, как разъярённый бык. Тип этого приёма зависит от формы пользователя. Он также может разрушать барьеры, такие как Световой экран и Отражение.
cobblemon.move.ragingfury.desc: Пользователь в течение двух-трёх ходов буйствует, извергая пламя. Затем пользователь впадает в замешательство.
cobblemon.move.raindance.desc: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves. It lowers the power of Fire-type moves.
cobblemon.move.rapidspin.desc: A spin attack that can also eliminate such moves as Bind, Wrap, and Leech Seed. This also raises the user’s Speed stat.
cobblemon.move.razorleaf.desc: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.razorshell.desc: The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.razorwind.desc: In this two-turn attack, blades of wind hit opposing Pokémon on the second turn. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.recover.desc: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.
cobblemon.move.recycle.desc: The user recycles a held item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.
cobblemon.move.reflect.desc: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical attacks for five turns.
cobblemon.move.reflecttype.desc: The user reflects the target’s type, making the user the same type as the target.
cobblemon.move.refresh.desc: The user rests to cure itself of poisoning, a burn, or paralysis.
cobblemon.move.relicsong.desc: The user sings an ancient song and attacks by appealing to the hearts of the listening opposing Pokémon. This may also induce sleep.
cobblemon.move.rest.desc: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.
cobblemon.move.retaliate.desc: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this move’s power is increased.
cobblemon.move.return.desc: This full-power attack grows more powerful the more the user likes its Trainer.
cobblemon.move.revelationdance.desc: Пользователь атакует цель, танцуя со всей своей силой. Этот приём становится такого же типа, как и тип пользователя.
cobblemon.move.revenge.desc: This attack move’s power is doubled if the user has been hurt by the opponent in the same turn.
cobblemon.move.reversal.desc: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.
cobblemon.move.revivalblessing.desc: Пользователь дарует любящее благословение, оживляя потерявшего сознание Покемона и восстанавливая половину его максимальных ОЗ.
cobblemon.move.risingvoltage.desc: Пользователь атакует электричеством, поднимающимся из земли. Сила этого приёма удваивается, если цель находится на Электрическом поле.
cobblemon.move.roar.desc: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
cobblemon.move.roaroftime.desc: The user blasts the target with power that distorts even time. The user can’t move on the next turn.
cobblemon.move.rockblast.desc: The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five rocks are launched in a row.
cobblemon.move.rockclimb.desc: The user attacks the target by smashing into it with incredible force. This may also confuse the target.
cobblemon.move.rockpolish.desc: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. This sharply raises the Speed stat.
cobblemon.move.rockslide.desc: Large boulders are hurled at opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokémon flinch.
cobblemon.move.rocksmash.desc: The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.rockthrow.desc: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.
cobblemon.move.rocktomb.desc: Boulders are hurled at the target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat by preventing its movement.
cobblemon.move.rockwrecker.desc: The user launches a huge boulder at the target to attack. The user can’t move on the next turn.
cobblemon.move.roleplay.desc: The user mimics the target completely, copying the target’s Ability.
cobblemon.move.rollingkick.desc: The user lashes out with a quick, spinning kick. This may also make the target flinch.
cobblemon.move.rollout.desc: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes more powerful each time it hits.
cobblemon.move.roost.desc: The user lands and rests its body. This move restores the user’s HP by up to half of its max HP.
cobblemon.move.rototiller.desc: Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier for plants to grow. This raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of Grass-type Pokémon.
cobblemon.move.round.desc: The user attacks the target with a song. Others can join in the Round to increase the power of the attack.
cobblemon.move.ruination.desc: Пользователь призывает разрушительное бедствие. Это уменьшает ОЗ цели вдвое.
cobblemon.move.sacredfire.desc: The target is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. This may also leave the target with a burn.
cobblemon.move.sacredsword.desc: The user attacks by slicing with a long horn. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.
cobblemon.move.safeguard.desc: The user creates a protective field that prevents status conditions for five turns.
cobblemon.move.saltcure.desc: Пользователь засаливает цель, нанося ей урон каждый ход. Стальной и Водный типы сильнее подвержены этому приёму.
cobblemon.move.sandattack.desc: Sand is hurled in the target’s face, reducing the target’s accuracy.
cobblemon.move.sandsearstorm.desc: Пользователь атакует, окутывая противников яростным ветром и обжигающе горячим песком. Это может обжечь противника.
cobblemon.move.sandstorm.desc: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all combatants except Rock, Ground, and Steel types. It raises the Sp. Def stat of Rock types.
cobblemon.move.sandtomb.desc: The user traps the target inside a harshly raging sandstorm for four to five turns.
cobblemon.move.sappyseed.desc: Пользователь выращивает гигантский стебель, который разбрасывает семена, чтобы атаковать цель. Семена уменьшают ОЗ цели каждый ход.
cobblemon.move.savagespinout.desc: Пользователь связывает цель нитями шёлка, которые он выплевывает, используя свою Z-Силу. Сила зависит от исходного приёма.
cobblemon.move.scald.desc: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. This may also leave the target with a burn.
cobblemon.move.scaleshot.desc: Пользователь атакует, стреляя чешуёй от двух до пяти раз подряд. Этот приём повышает Скорость пользователя, но понижает Защиту.
cobblemon.move.scaryface.desc: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.
cobblemon.move.scorchingsands.desc: Пользователь бросает в цель раскалённый песок, чтобы атаковать. Это также может обжечь цель.
cobblemon.move.scratch.desc: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.
cobblemon.move.screech.desc: An earsplitting screech harshly lowers the target’s Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.searingshot.desc: The user torches everything around it in an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits with a burn.
cobblemon.move.searingsunrazesmash.desc: После получения Z-Силы, Солгалео атакует цель с полной силой. Этот приём может игнорировать эффекты от Способности у цели.
cobblemon.move.secretpower.desc: The additional effects of this attack depend upon where it was used.
cobblemon.move.secretsword.desc: The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power contained in the horn does physical damage to the target.
cobblemon.move.seedbomb.desc: The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.
cobblemon.move.seedflare.desc: The user emits a shock wave from its body to attack its target. This may also harshly lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
cobblemon.move.seismictoss.desc: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.
cobblemon.move.selfdestruct.desc: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.
cobblemon.move.shadowball.desc: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
cobblemon.move.shadowbone.desc: Пользователь атакует, ударяя цель костью, в которой заключён дух. Это также может понизить Защиту цели.
cobblemon.move.shadowclaw.desc: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.shadowforce.desc: The user disappears, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.
cobblemon.move.shadowpunch.desc: The user throws a punch from the shadows. This attack never misses.
cobblemon.move.shadowsneak.desc: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first.
cobblemon.move.sharpen.desc: The user makes its edges more jagged, which raises its Attack stat.
cobblemon.move.shatteredpsyche.desc: Пользователь контролирует цель с помощью Z-Силы и наносит ей удар с полной силой. Сила зависит от исходного приёма.
cobblemon.move.shedtail.desc: Пользователь создаёт себе подмену, используя собственные ОЗ, а затем меняется местами с ожидающим его Покемоном.
cobblemon.move.sheercold.desc: The target faints instantly. It’s less likely to hit the target if it’s used by Pokémon other than Ice types.
cobblemon.move.shellsidearm.desc: Этот приём может быть физическим или специальным в зависимости от того, что нанесёт больше урона. Это также может отравить цель.
cobblemon.move.shellsmash.desc: The user breaks its shell, which lowers Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply raises its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.
cobblemon.move.shelltrap.desc: Пользователь устанавливает ловушку. Если пользователь получает удар физическим приёмом, ловушка взрывается и наносит урон противнику.
cobblemon.move.shelter.desc: Пользователь делает свою кожу твёрдой, как железный щит, резко повышая свою Защиту.
cobblemon.move.shiftgear.desc: The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack stat and sharply raising its Speed stat.
cobblemon.move.shockwave.desc: The user strikes the target with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack never misses.
cobblemon.move.shoreup.desc: Пользователь восстанавливает свои ОЗ до половины своих максимальных ОЗ. В песчаной буре он восстанавливает больше ОЗ.
cobblemon.move.signalbeam.desc: The user attacks with a sinister beam of light. This may also confuse the target.
cobblemon.move.silktrap.desc: Пользователь закручивает шёлковую ловушку, защищая себя от урона и понижая Скорость любого нападающего, вступившего в прямой контакт.
cobblemon.move.silverwind.desc: The target is attacked with powdery scales blown by the wind. This may also raise all the user’s stats.
cobblemon.move.simplebeam.desc: The user’s mysterious psychic wave changes the target’s Ability to Simple.
cobblemon.move.sing.desc: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.
cobblemon.move.sinisterarrowraid.desc: Десиджуай создаёт бесчисленное количество стрел, используя свою Z-Силу, и стреляет в цель с полной силой.
cobblemon.move.sizzlyslide.desc: Пользователь окружает себя огнём и бросается на цель. Это также обжигает цель.
cobblemon.move.sketch.desc: It enables the user to permanently learn the move last used by the target. Once used, Sketch disappears.
cobblemon.move.skillswap.desc: The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target.
cobblemon.move.skittersmack.desc: Пользователь мчится за цель, чтобы атаковать. Это также понижает Спец. Атаку цели.
cobblemon.move.skullbash.desc: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.
cobblemon.move.skyattack.desc: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. This may also make the target flinch.
cobblemon.move.skydrop.desc: The user takes the target into the sky, then drops it during the next turn. The target cannot attack while in the sky.
cobblemon.move.skyuppercut.desc: The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.
cobblemon.move.slackoff.desc: The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to half of its max HP.
cobblemon.move.slam.desc: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or the like to inflict damage.
cobblemon.move.slash.desc: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.sleeppowder.desc: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.
cobblemon.move.sleeptalk.desc: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.
cobblemon.move.sludge.desc: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.
cobblemon.move.sludgebomb.desc: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.
cobblemon.move.sludgewave.desc: The user strikes everything around it by swamping the area with a giant sludge wave. This may also poison those hit.
cobblemon.move.smackdown.desc: The user throws a stone or similar projectile to attack the target. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when it’s hit.
cobblemon.move.smartstrike.desc: Пользователь наносит удар по цели острым рогом. Этот приём никогда не промахивается.
cobblemon.move.smellingsalts.desc: This attack’s power is doubled when used on a target with paralysis. This also cures the target’s paralysis, however.
cobblemon.move.smog.desc: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. This may also poison the target.
cobblemon.move.smokescreen.desc: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target’s accuracy.
cobblemon.move.snaptrap.desc: Пользователь ловит цель в ловушку, которая наносит урон в течение четырёх-пяти ходов.
cobblemon.move.snarl.desc: The user yells as if it’s ranting about something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stats of opposing Pokémon.
cobblemon.move.snatch.desc: The user steals the effects of any attempts to use a healing or stat-changing move.
cobblemon.move.snipeshot.desc: Пользователь игнорирует эффекты приёмов и способностей противника, которые притягивают к себе приёмы, позволяя этому приёму поразить выбранную цель.
cobblemon.move.snore.desc: This attack can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.
cobblemon.move.snowscape.desc: Пользователь призывает метель на пять ходов. Это повышает Защиту Покемонов Ледяного типа.
cobblemon.move.soak.desc: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target’s type to Water.
cobblemon.move.softboiled.desc: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.
cobblemon.move.solarbeam.desc: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.
cobblemon.move.solarblade.desc: Пользователь собирает свет в первом ходу, затем наполняет лезвие энергией света и атакует в следующем ходу.
cobblemon.move.sonicboom.desc: The target is hit with a destructive shock wave that always inflicts 20 HP damage.
cobblemon.move.soulstealing7starstrike.d: После получения Z-Силы, Маршадоу последовательно бьёт и пинает цель с полной силой.
cobblemon.move.spacialrend.desc: The user tears the target along with the space around it. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.spark.desc: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
cobblemon.move.sparklingaria.desc: Пользователь начинает петь, выпуская множество пузырей. Любой Покемон, страдающий от ожога, будет исцелён прикосновением этих пузырьков.
cobblemon.move.sparklyswirl.desc: Пользователь атакует цель, обволакивая её вихрем сильного запаха. Это также лечит все статусные эффекты в команде пользователя.
cobblemon.move.spectralthief.desc: Пользователь скрывается в тени цели, крадёт повышения её показателей, а затем атакует.
cobblemon.move.spicyextract.desc: Пользователь испускает невероятно острый экстракт, резко повышающий Атаку цели и резко понижающий её Защиту.
cobblemon.move.spiderweb.desc: The user ensnares the target with thin, gooey silk so it can’t flee from battle.
cobblemon.move.spikecannon.desc: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.
cobblemon.move.spikes.desc: The user lays a trap of spikes at the opposing team’s feet. The trap hurts Pokémon that switch into battle.
cobblemon.move.spikyshield.desc: Помимо защиты пользователя от атак, этот приём также наносит урон любому атакующему, который вступает в прямой контакт.
cobblemon.move.spinout.desc: Пользователь яростно вращается, напрягая ноги, нанося урон цели. Это также сильно понижает Скорость пользователя.
cobblemon.move.spiritbreak.desc: Пользователь атакует цель с такой силой, что может сломить её дух. Это также понижает Спец. Атаку цели.
cobblemon.move.spiritshackle.desc: Пользователь атакует и одновременно приковывает тень цели к земле, чтобы она не смогла сбежать.
cobblemon.move.spite.desc: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.
cobblemon.move.spitup.desc: The power stored using the move Stockpile is released at once in an attack. The more power is stored, the greater the move’s power.
cobblemon.move.splash.desc: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...
cobblemon.move.splinteredstormshards.des: После получения Z-Силы, Ликанрок атакует цель с полной силой. Этот приём отменяет эффекты на поле битвы.
cobblemon.move.splishysplash.desc: Пользователь заряжает огромную волну электричеством и поражает ею противника. Это также может парализовать противника.
cobblemon.move.spore.desc: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.
cobblemon.move.spotlight.desc: Пользователь направляет прожектор на цель, чтобы в течение хода атаковалась только она.
cobblemon.move.springtidestorm.desc: Пользователь атакует, обволакивая противника яростным ветром, наполненным любовью и ненавистью. Это также может понизить Атаку противника.
cobblemon.move.stealthrock.desc: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap hurts opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.
cobblemon.move.steameruption.desc: Пользователь погружает цель в перегретый пар. Это также может обжечь цель.
cobblemon.move.steamroller.desc: The user crushes its target by rolling over the target with its rolled-up body. This may also make the target flinch.
cobblemon.move.steelbeam.desc: Пользователь выпускает луч стали, который он собирает со всего своего тела. Это также наносит урон пользователю.
cobblemon.move.steelroller.desc: Пользователь атакует, разрушая поле. Этот приём не сработает, если в битве нету активного поля.
cobblemon.move.steelwing.desc: The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also raise the user’s Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.stickyweb.desc: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stats upon switching into battle.
cobblemon.move.stockpile.desc: The user charges up power and raises both its Defense and Sp. Def stats. The move can be used three times.
cobblemon.move.stokedsparksurfer.desc: После получения Z-Силы, Алольский Райчу атакует цель с полной силой. Этот приём парализует цель.
cobblemon.move.stomp.desc: The target is stomped with a big foot. This may also make the target flinch.
cobblemon.move.stompingtantrum.desc: Движимый разочарованием, пользователь атакует цель. Сила этого приёма удваивается, если предыдущая атака пользователя не удалась.
cobblemon.move.stoneaxe.desc: Пользователь замахивается каменными топорами на цель. Каменные осколки, оставшиеся после этого приёма, парят вокруг цели.
cobblemon.move.stoneedge.desc: The user stabs the target from below with sharpened stones. Critical hits land more easily.
cobblemon.move.storedpower.desc: The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the move’s power.
cobblemon.move.stormthrow.desc: The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit.
cobblemon.move.strangesteam.desc: Пользователь атакует цель, выпуская пар. Это также может оставить цель в замешательстве.
cobblemon.move.strength.desc: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power.
cobblemon.move.strengthsap.desc: Пользователь восстанавливает свои ОЗ на количество, равное показателю Атаки цели. Затем он понижает Атаку цели.
cobblemon.move.stringshot.desc: Opposing Pokémon are bound with silk blown from the user’s mouth that harshly lowers the Speed stat.
cobblemon.move.struggle.desc: This attack is used in desperation only if the user has no PP. It also damages the user a little.
cobblemon.move.strugglebug.desc: While resisting, the user attacks opposing Pokémon. This lowers the Sp. Atk stats of those hit.
cobblemon.move.stuffcheeks.desc: Пользователь съедает удерживаемую ягоду, после чего резко повышает свою Защиту.
cobblemon.move.stunspore.desc: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.
cobblemon.move.submission.desc: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. This also damages the user a little.
cobblemon.move.substitute.desc: The user creates a substitute for itself using some of its HP. The substitute serves as the user’s decoy.
cobblemon.move.subzeroslammer.desc: Пользователь резко понижает температуру с помощью своей Z-силы и замораживает цель с полной силой. Сила зависит от исходного приёма.
cobblemon.move.suckerpunch.desc: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.
cobblemon.move.sunnyday.desc: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves. It lowers the power of Water-type moves.
cobblemon.move.sunsteelstrike.desc: Пользователь врезается в цель с силой метеорита. Этот приём можно использовать на цели независимо от её способности.
cobblemon.move.superfang.desc: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target’s HP in half.
cobblemon.move.superpower.desc: The user attacks the target with great power. However, this also lowers the user’s Attack and Defense stats.
cobblemon.move.supersonic.desc: The user generates odd sound waves from its body that confuse the target.
cobblemon.move.supersonicskystrike.desc: Пользователь взмывает вверх с помощью Z-Силы и с полной скоростью пикирует на цель. Сила зависит от исходного приёма.
cobblemon.move.surf.desc: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
cobblemon.move.surgingstrikes.desc: Пользователь, освоивший Водяной стиль, наносит цели три удара подряд плавными движениями. Этот приём всегда наносит критический урон.
cobblemon.move.swagger.desc: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.
cobblemon.move.swallow.desc: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to heal its HP. Storing more power heals more HP.
cobblemon.move.sweetkiss.desc: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.
cobblemon.move.sweetscent.desc: A sweet scent that harshly lowers opposing Pokémon’s evasiveness.
cobblemon.move.swift.desc: Star-shaped rays are shot at opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.
cobblemon.move.switcheroo.desc: The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow.
cobblemon.move.swordsdance.desc: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user’s Attack stat.
cobblemon.move.synchronoise.desc: Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it.
cobblemon.move.synthesis.desc: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.
cobblemon.move.tackle.desc: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.
cobblemon.move.tailglow.desc: The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind, drastically raising its Sp. Atk stat.
cobblemon.move.tailslap.desc: The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. It hits the target two to five times in a row.
cobblemon.move.tailwhip.desc: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stats.
cobblemon.move.tailwind.desc: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed stats of the user and its allies for four turns.
cobblemon.move.takedown.desc: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.
cobblemon.move.takeheart.desc: Пользователь поднимает себе настроение, леча свои состояния и повышая Спец. Атаку и Спец. Защиту.
cobblemon.move.tarshot.desc: Пользователь выливает липкую дёготь на цель, понижая её Скорость. Цель становится более уязвимой к приёмам Огненного типа.
cobblemon.move.taunt.desc: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.
cobblemon.move.tearfullook.desc: Глаза пользователя начинают слезиться, чтобы лишить цель боевого духа. Это понижает Атаку и Спец. Атаку цели.
cobblemon.move.teatime.desc: Пользователь устраивает чаепитие со всеми Покемонами, участвующими в битве. Каждый Покемон съедает свою ягоду.
cobblemon.move.technoblast.desc: The user fires a beam of light at its target. The move’s type changes depending on the Drive the user holds.
cobblemon.move.tectonicrage.desc: Пользователь зарывается глубоко в землю и врезается в цель с полной мощью с помощью своей Z-Силы. Сила зависит от исходного приёма.
cobblemon.move.teeterdance.desc: The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses the Pokémon around it.
cobblemon.move.telekinesis.desc: The user makes the target float with its psychic power. The target is easier to hit for three turns.
cobblemon.move.teleport.desc: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, if any. If a wild Pokémon uses this move, it flees.
cobblemon.move.terablast.desc: Если пользователь Терасталлизирован, он высвобождает энергию своего Тера типа. Этот приём наносит урон, используя Атаку или Спец. Атаку в зависимости от того, какой показатель выше.
cobblemon.move.terrainpulse.desc: Пользователь использует энергию поля для атаки. Тип и сила этого приёма меняются в зависимости от поля в момент его использования.
cobblemon.move.thief.desc: The user attacks and steals the target’s held item simultaneously. The user can’t steal anything if it already holds an item.
cobblemon.move.thousandarrows.desc: Этот приём может поразить противников, находящихся в воздухе. Покемоны, по которым попала атака, будут сбиты на землю.
cobblemon.move.thousandwaves.desc: Пользователь атакует волной, которая ползет по земле. Те, кого она задевает, не могут бежать с поля битвы.
cobblemon.move.thrash.desc: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.
cobblemon.move.throatchop.desc: Пользователь наносит удар по горлу цели, и полученные страдания не позволяют цели использовать звуковые приёмы в течение двух ходов.
cobblemon.move.thunder.desc: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
cobblemon.move.thunderbolt.desc: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
cobblemon.move.thundercage.desc: Пользователь заманивает цель в клетку из искрящегося электричества, которая наносит урон в течение четырёх-пяти ходов.
cobblemon.move.thunderfang.desc: The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.
cobblemon.move.thunderouskick.desc: Пользователь ошеломляет цель молниеносным движением, а затем наносит пинок. Это также понижает Защиту цели.
cobblemon.move.thunderpunch.desc: The target is punched with an electrified fist. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
cobblemon.move.thundershock.desc: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
cobblemon.move.thunderwave.desc: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.
cobblemon.move.tickle.desc: The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.
cobblemon.move.tidyup.desc: Пользователь приводит себя в порядок и снимает эффекты Шипов, Потайного камня, Липкой паутины, Токсичных шипов и Подмены. Это также повышает Атаку и Скорость пользователя.
cobblemon.move.topsyturvy.desc: Все изменения показателей, влияющие на цель, переворачиваются вверх тормашками и становятся противоположными тому, чем были ранее.
cobblemon.move.torchsong.desc: Пользователь выдувает яростное пламя, словно поёт песню, испепеляя цель. Это также повышает Спец. Атаку пользователя.
cobblemon.move.torment.desc: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.
cobblemon.move.toxic.desc: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
cobblemon.move.toxicspikes.desc: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team. The spikes will poison opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.
cobblemon.move.toxicthread.desc: Пользователь стреляет ядовитыми нитями, чтобы отравить цель и понизить её Скорость.
cobblemon.move.trailblaze.desc: Пользователь внезапно атакует, словно выпрыгивая из высокой травы. Ловкость ног пользователя повышает его Скорость.
cobblemon.move.transform.desc: The user transforms into a copy of the target right down to having the same move set.
cobblemon.move.triattack.desc: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. This may also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
cobblemon.move.trick.desc: The user catches the target off guard and swaps its held item with its own.
cobblemon.move.trickortreat.desc: The user takes the target trick-or-treating. This adds Ghost type to the target’s type.
cobblemon.move.trickroom.desc: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.
cobblemon.move.triplearrows.desc: Пользователь пинается, а затем пускает три стрелы. Этот приём имеет повышенный шанс нанесения критического удара, а также может понизить Защиту цели или заставить её вздрогнуть.
cobblemon.move.tripleaxel.desc: Приём, состоящий из трёх последовательных пинков, которые становятся всё более мощными с каждым успешным попаданием.
cobblemon.move.tripledive.desc: Пользователь совершает идеальный тройной нырок, попадая в цель брызгами воды три раза подряд.
cobblemon.move.triplekick.desc: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.
cobblemon.move.tropkick.desc: Пользователь наносит цели мощный удар тропического происхождения. Это также понижает Атаку цели.
cobblemon.move.trumpcard.desc: The fewer PP this move has, the greater its power.
cobblemon.move.twinbeam.desc: Пользователь стреляет мистическими лучами из своих глаз, чтобы нанести урон. Этот приём бьёт дважды.
cobblemon.move.twineedle.desc: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.
cobblemon.move.twinkletackle.desc: Пользователь создаёт очаровательное пространство, используя свою Z-Силу, и играется с целью. Сила зависит от исходного приёма.
cobblemon.move.twister.desc: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at opposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.
cobblemon.move.uproar.desc: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. During that time, no Pokémon can fall asleep.
cobblemon.move.uturn.desc: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.
cobblemon.move.vacuumwave.desc: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the target. This move always goes first.
cobblemon.move.vcreate.desc: With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself at its target. This lowers the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.
cobblemon.move.veeveevolley.desc: Чем больше Иви любит своего Тренера, тем сильнее становится этот приём. Он никогда не промахивается.
cobblemon.move.venomdrench.desc: Противники обливаются странной ядовитой жидкостью. Это понижает Атаку, Спец. Атаку и Скорость отравленной цели.
cobblemon.move.venoshock.desc: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move’s power is doubled if the target is poisoned.
cobblemon.move.victorydance.desc: Пользователь исполняет энергичный танец, чтобы приветствовать победу, повышая свою Атаку, Защиту и Скорость.
cobblemon.move.vinewhip.desc: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.
cobblemon.move.visegrip.desc: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.
cobblemon.move.vitalthrow.desc: The user attacks last. In return, this throw move never misses.
cobblemon.move.voltswitch.desc: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.
cobblemon.move.volttackle.desc: The user electrifies itself and charges the target. This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack may leave the target with paralysis.
cobblemon.move.wakeupslap.desc: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. This also wakes the target up, however.
cobblemon.move.waterfall.desc: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.
cobblemon.move.watergun.desc: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.
cobblemon.move.waterpledge.desc: A column of water hits the target. When used with its fire equivalent, its power increases and a rainbow appears.
cobblemon.move.waterpulse.desc: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.
cobblemon.move.watershuriken.desc: Пользователь попадает в цель метательными звёздочками от двух до пяти раз подряд. Этот приём всегда ходит первым.
cobblemon.move.watersport.desc: The user soaks the battlefield with water. This weakens Fire-type moves for five turns.
cobblemon.move.waterspout.desc: The user spouts water to damage opposing Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the move’s power.
cobblemon.move.wavecrash.desc: Пользователь обволакивает себя водой и с силой врезается в цель всем телом, нанося ей урон. Это также наносит пользователю значительный урон.
cobblemon.move.weatherball.desc: This attack move varies in power and type depending on the weather.
cobblemon.move.whirlpool.desc: The user traps the target in a violent swirling whirlpool for four to five turns.
cobblemon.move.whirlwind.desc: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
cobblemon.move.wickedblow.desc: Пользователь, освоивший Тёмный стиль, наносит цели один сильный удар. Этот приём всегда наносит критический урон.
cobblemon.move.wickedtorque.desc: Has a 10% chance to cause the target to fall asleep.
cobblemon.move.wideguard.desc: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn.
cobblemon.move.wildboltstorm.desc: Пользователь вызывает грозовую бурю и жестоко атакует молниями и ветром. Это может парализовать противника.
cobblemon.move.wildcharge.desc: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. This also damages the user a little.
cobblemon.move.willowisp.desc: The user shoots a sinister flame at the target to inflict a burn.
cobblemon.move.wingattack.desc: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.
cobblemon.move.wish.desc: One turn after this move is used, the user’s or its replacement’s HP is restored by half the user’s max HP.
cobblemon.move.withdraw.desc: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.
cobblemon.move.wonderroom.desc: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.
cobblemon.move.woodhammer.desc: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.
cobblemon.move.workup.desc: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats increase.
cobblemon.move.worryseed.desc: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making the target’s Ability Insomnia.
cobblemon.move.wrap.desc: A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.
cobblemon.move.wringout.desc: The user powerfully wrings the target. The more HP the target has, the greater the move’s power.
cobblemon.move.xscissor.desc: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.
cobblemon.move.yawn.desc: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.
cobblemon.move.zapcannon.desc: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.
cobblemon.move.zenheadbutt.desc: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. This may also make the target flinch.
cobblemon.move.zingzap.desc: Пользователь врезается в цель, нанося ей мощный электрический удар. Это также может заставить цель вздрогнуть.
cobblemon.move.zippyzap.desc: Пользователь атакует цель электрическими разрядами с высокой скоростью. Пользователь всегда ходит первым и наносит критический урон.
cobblemon.species.bulbasaur.name: Бульбазавр
cobblemon.species.bulbasaur.desc: While it is young, it uses the nutrients that are stored in the seed on its back in order to grow.
cobblemon.species.ivysaur.name: Айвизавр
cobblemon.species.ivysaur.desc: Exposure to sunlight adds to its strength. Sunlight also makes the bud on its back grow larger.
cobblemon.species.venusaur.name: Венузавр
cobblemon.species.venusaur.desc: A bewitching aroma wafts from its flower. The fragrance becalms those engaged in a battle.
cobblemon.species.charmander.name: Чармандер
cobblemon.species.charmander.desc: From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.
cobblemon.species.charmeleon.name: Чармелеон
cobblemon.species.charmeleon.desc: If it becomes agitated during battle, it spouts intense flames, incinerating its surroundings.
cobblemon.species.charizard.name: Чаризард
cobblemon.species.charizard.desc: Its wings can carry this Pokémon close to an altitude of 4,600 feet. It blows out fire at very high temperatures.
cobblemon.species.squirtle.name: Сквиртл
cobblemon.species.squirtle.desc: When it feels threatened, it draws its limbs inside its shell and sprays water from its mouth.
cobblemon.species.wartortle.name: Вартортл
cobblemon.species.wartortle.desc: It cleverly controls its furry ears and tail to maintain its balance while swimming.
cobblemon.species.blastoise.name: Бластойз
cobblemon.species.blastoise.desc: The rocket cannons on its shell fire jets of water capable of punching holes through thick steel.
cobblemon.species.caterpie.name: Катерпи
cobblemon.species.caterpie.desc: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.
cobblemon.species.metapod.name: Метапод
cobblemon.species.metapod.desc: Even though it is encased in a sturdy shell, the body inside is tender. It can’t withstand a harsh attack.
cobblemon.species.butterfree.name: Баттерфри
cobblemon.species.butterfree.desc: It collects honey every day. It rubs honey onto the hairs on its legs to carry it back to its nest.
cobblemon.species.weedle.name: Видл
cobblemon.species.weedle.desc: Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides in grass and bushes where it eats leaves.
cobblemon.species.kakuna.name: Какуна
cobblemon.species.kakuna.desc: Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.
cobblemon.species.beedrill.name: Бидрилл
cobblemon.species.beedrill.desc: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.
cobblemon.species.pidgey.name: Пиджи
cobblemon.species.pidgey.desc: Very docile. If attacked, it will often kick up sand to protect itself rather than fight back.
cobblemon.species.pidgeotto.name: Пиджеотто
cobblemon.species.pidgeotto.desc: This Pokémon is full of vitality. It constantly flies around its large territory in search of prey.
cobblemon.species.pidgeot.name: Пиджеот
cobblemon.species.pidgeot.desc: This Pokémon flies at Mach 2 speed, seeking prey. Its large talons are feared as wicked weapons.
cobblemon.species.rattata.name: Раттата
cobblemon.species.rattata.desc: Will chew on anything with its fangs. If you see one, you can be certain that 40 more live in the area.
cobblemon.species.raticate.name: Ратикейт
cobblemon.species.raticate.desc: Its hind feet are webbed. They act as flippers, so it can swim in rivers and hunt for prey.
cobblemon.species.spearow.name: Спироу
cobblemon.species.spearow.desc: Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around very fast to protect its territory.
cobblemon.species.fearow.name: Фироу
cobblemon.species.fearow.desc: A Pokémon that dates back many years. If it senses danger, it flies high and away, instantly.
cobblemon.species.ekans.name: Эканс
cobblemon.species.ekans.desc: The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.
cobblemon.species.arbok.name: Арбок
cobblemon.species.arbok.desc: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.
cobblemon.species.pikachu.name: Пикачу
cobblemon.species.pikachu.desc: Possesses cheek sacs in which it stores electricity. This clever forest-dweller roasts tough berries with an electric shock before consuming them.
cobblemon.species.raichu.name: Райчу
cobblemon.species.raichu.desc: It can discharge bursts of electricity exceeding 100,000 volts— a single strike with that amount of power would incapacitate one of the Copperajah of my homeland.
cobblemon.species.sandshrew.name: Сэндшрю
cobblemon.species.sandshrew.desc: It burrows into the ground to create its nest. If hard stones impede its tunneling, it uses its sharp claws to shatter them and then carries on digging.
cobblemon.species.sandslash.name: Сэндслеш
cobblemon.species.sandslash.desc: It climbs trees by hooking on with its sharp claws. Sandslash shares the berries it gathers, dropping them down to Sandshrew waiting below the tree.
cobblemon.species.nidoranf.name: Нидоран
cobblemon.species.nidoranf.desc: It uses its hard incisor teeth to crush and eat berries. The tip of a female Nidoran’s horn is a bit more rounded than the tip of a male’s horn.
cobblemon.species.nidorina.name: Нидорина
cobblemon.species.nidorina.desc: If the group is threatened, these Pokémon will band together to assault enemies with a chorus of ultrasonic waves.
cobblemon.species.nidoqueen.name: Нидоквин
cobblemon.species.nidoqueen.desc: It pacifies offspring by placing them in the gaps between the spines on its back. The spines will never secrete poison while young are present.
cobblemon.species.nidoranm.name: Нидоран
cobblemon.species.nidoranm.desc: Small but brave, this Pokémon will hold its ground and even risk its life in battle to protect the female it’s friendly with.
cobblemon.species.nidorino.name: Нидорино
cobblemon.species.nidorino.desc: It’s nervous and quick to act aggressively. The potency of its poison increases along with the level of adrenaline present in its body.
cobblemon.species.nidoking.name: Нидокинг
cobblemon.species.nidoking.desc: Nidoking prides itself on its strength. It’s forceful and spirited in battle, making use of its thick tail and diamond-crushing horn.
cobblemon.species.clefairy.name: Клефейри
cobblemon.species.clefairy.desc: It can be found in quiet mountain areas on a full moon's night. Its dancing and its tiny, faintly glowing wings confer upon it a lovely fairylike quality.
cobblemon.species.clefable.name: Клефейбл
cobblemon.species.clefable.desc: Legend says that on clear, quiet nights, it listens for the voices of its kin living on the moon. I, too, often think of my homeland, so far away.
cobblemon.species.vulpix.name: Вульпикс
cobblemon.species.vulpix.desc: In its belly burns a fire, which Vulpix spits out in the form of fireballs. When young, this Pokémon has but one white tail. As the Pokémon matures, this single tail splits into six.
cobblemon.species.ninetales.name: Найнтейлс
cobblemon.species.ninetales.desc: The coat of gleaming golden fur is quite magnificent. This species is said to store sacred power in its nine long tails and to live for a millennium.
cobblemon.species.jigglypuff.name: Джигглипафф
cobblemon.species.jigglypuff.desc: By freely changing the wavelength of its voice, Jigglypuff sings a mysterious melody sure to make any listener sleepy.
cobblemon.species.wigglytuff.name: Вигглитафф
cobblemon.species.wigglytuff.desc: It’s proud of its fur, which is fine and delicate. In particular, the curl on its forehead has a texture that’s perfectly heavenly.
cobblemon.species.zubat.name: Зубат
cobblemon.species.zubat.desc: Makes its home in gloomy caves. Atrophied eyes have left this Pokémon blind, so it scans its surroundings via sound waves that it emits from its mouth as it flies.
cobblemon.species.golbat.name: Голбат
cobblemon.species.golbat.desc: It sinks its sharp fangs into other creatures and slurps up their blood. A closer look at the fangs reveals that they are hollow and akin to straws.
cobblemon.species.oddish.name: Оддиш
cobblemon.species.oddish.desc: During the day, it stays in the cold underground to avoid the sun. It grows by bathing in moonlight.
cobblemon.species.gloom.name: Глум
cobblemon.species.gloom.desc: What appears to be drool is actually sweet honey. It is very sticky and clings stubbornly if touched.
cobblemon.species.vileplume.name: Вайлплум
cobblemon.species.vileplume.desc: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.
cobblemon.species.paras.name: Парас
cobblemon.species.paras.desc: Sometimes seen at the foot of trees in humid forests. The mushrooms on its back—called tochukaso—are not present on infant specimens and instead emerge as Paras matures.
cobblemon.species.parasect.name: Парасект
cobblemon.species.parasect.desc: Mushroom-lacking specimens of this Pokémon lie unmoving in the forest, lending credence to the hypothesis that the large mushroom is in control of Parasect's actions.
cobblemon.species.venonat.name: Венонат
cobblemon.species.venonat.desc: Its large eyes act as radar. In a bright place, you can see that they are clusters of many tiny eyes.
cobblemon.species.venomoth.name: Веномот
cobblemon.species.venomoth.desc: The powdery scales on its wings are hard to remove from skin. They also contain poison that leaks out on contact.
cobblemon.species.diglett.name: Диглетт
cobblemon.species.diglett.desc: It burrows through the ground at a shallow depth. It leaves raised earth in its wake, making it easy to spot.
cobblemon.species.dugtrio.name: Дагтрио
cobblemon.species.dugtrio.desc: These Diglett triplets dig over 60 miles below sea level. No one knows what it’s like underground.
cobblemon.species.meowth.name: Мяут
cobblemon.species.meowth.desc: It loves to collect shiny things. If it’s in a good mood, it might even let its Trainer have a look at its hoard of treasures.
cobblemon.species.persian.name: Персиан
cobblemon.species.persian.desc: Its elegant and refined behavior clashes with that of the barbaric Perrserker. The relationship between the two is one of mutual disdain.
cobblemon.species.psyduck.name: Псайдак
cobblemon.species.psyduck.desc: Suffers perpetual headaches. If the agony grows too great, Psyduck's latent power erupts, contrary to Psyduck's intent. Ergo, I am exploring ways to ease the pain.
cobblemon.species.golduck.name: Голдак
cobblemon.species.golduck.desc: Its body is strong, and it has webbing on its hands and feet. Golduck can swim easily through rough seas, clawing its way through the high waves.
cobblemon.species.mankey.name: Манки
cobblemon.species.mankey.desc: An agile Pokémon that lives in trees. It angers easily and will not hesitate to attack anything.
cobblemon.species.primeape.name: Праймейп
cobblemon.species.primeape.desc: It stops being angry only when nobody else is around. To view this moment is very difficult.
cobblemon.species.growlithe.name: Гроулит
cobblemon.species.growlithe.desc: They patrol their territory in pairs. I believe the igneous rock components in the fur of this species are the result of volcanic activity in its habitat.
cobblemon.species.arcanine.name: Арканайн
cobblemon.species.arcanine.desc: Snaps at its foes with fangs cloaked in blazing flame. Despite its bulk, it deftly feints every which way, leading opponents on a deceptively merry chase as it all but dances around them.
cobblemon.species.poliwag.name: Поливаг
cobblemon.species.poliwag.desc: In rivers with fast-flowing water, this Pokémon will cling to a rock by using its thick lips, which act like a suction cup.
cobblemon.species.poliwhirl.name: Поливёрл
cobblemon.species.poliwhirl.desc: This Pokémon’s sweat is a slimy mucus. When captured, Poliwhirl can slither from its enemies’ grasp and escape.
cobblemon.species.poliwrath.name: Поливрат
cobblemon.species.poliwrath.desc: Poliwrath is skilled at both swimming and martial arts. It uses its well-trained arms to dish out powerful punches.
cobblemon.species.abra.name: Абра
cobblemon.species.abra.desc: Spends 18 hours of the day sleeping. Even while asleep, Abra can control its psychic powers—should danger approach, the Pokémon will simply teleport away.
cobblemon.species.kadabra.name: Кадабра
cobblemon.species.kadabra.desc: There are rumors that a child with mystical powers became a Kadabra; however, this remains unverified. I suspect that the spoon Kadabra holds enhances its brain waves.
cobblemon.species.alakazam.name: Алаказам
cobblemon.species.alakazam.desc: The longer Alakazam lives, the larger and heavier its head becomes. Our tests have shown that the strength of its psychic powers correlates positively to the weight of its head.
cobblemon.species.machop.name: Мачоп
cobblemon.species.machop.desc: Though as small as a child, it has strength enough to easily throw a well-built adult. Striving to become ever stronger, Machop trains by carrying a Graveler on its shoulders.
cobblemon.species.machoke.name: Мачок
cobblemon.species.machoke.desc: A sturdy creature boasting a robust physique and boundless stamina. Loves training above all else and voluntarily assists with tasks such as construction and clearing land.
cobblemon.species.machamp.name: Мачамп
cobblemon.species.machamp.desc: In close combat, its four arms afford it offensive and defensive supremacy. In but a blink, this valiant Pokémon can overwhelm its foes with more than 1,000 blows from its fists.
cobblemon.species.bellsprout.name: Беллспраут
cobblemon.species.bellsprout.desc: Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares tiny bugs with its vines and devours them.
cobblemon.species.weepinbell.name: Випинбелл
cobblemon.species.weepinbell.desc: When hungry, it swallows anything that moves. Its hapless prey is dissolved by strong acids.
cobblemon.species.victreebel.name: Виктрибелл
cobblemon.species.victreebel.desc: Lures prey with the sweet aroma of honey. Swallowed whole, the prey is dissolved in a day, bones and all.
cobblemon.species.tentacool.name: Тентакул
cobblemon.species.tentacool.desc: They fire beams from the glassy, magenta orbs that resemble eyes atop their heads, and they drift in shallow seas. During low tide, they can sometimes be found on beaches, desiccated.
cobblemon.species.tentacruel.name: Тентакрул
cobblemon.species.tentacruel.desc: It has 80 tentacles, each with a venomous tip. These tentacles are also extendible, lengthening when Tentacruel attempts to catch prey. Use caution.
cobblemon.species.geodude.name: Геодуд
cobblemon.species.geodude.desc: Makes its home in mountainous regions, using its arms to climb along harsh mountain roads. Can be troublesome—carelessly kicking one will cause it to fly into a rage and chase after you.
cobblemon.species.graveler.name: Гравелер
cobblemon.species.graveler.desc: Dwells in holes dug into sheer walls of stone. It enjoys rolling down slopes as though it were a boulder during a rockfall, so keep an eye upward while traversing mountain roads.
cobblemon.species.golem.name: Голем
cobblemon.species.golem.desc: The rocklike shell is shed each year. The cast-off shell then crumbles, reverting to a mass of soil, which can be spread across fields to promote crop growth.
cobblemon.species.ponyta.name: Понита
cobblemon.species.ponyta.desc: These Pokémon live in herds out in the grassland. Newborn foals lack their fiery manes, which will develop about an hour after birth.
cobblemon.species.rapidash.name: Рапидэш
cobblemon.species.rapidash.desc: Fiery mane aglow, Rapidash darts like an arrow across the land. This prodigiously swift creature can traverse the vast region of Hisui in a day and a half.
cobblemon.species.slowpoke.name: Слоупок
cobblemon.species.slowpoke.desc: When this Pokémon’s tail is soaked in water, sweetness seeps from it. Slowpoke uses this trait to lure in and fish up other Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.slowbro.name: Слоубро
cobblemon.species.slowbro.desc: Being bitten by a Shellder shocked this Pokémon into standing on two legs. If the Shellder lets go, it seems Slowbro will turn back into a Slowpoke.
cobblemon.species.magnemite.name: Магнемайт
cobblemon.species.magnemite.desc: A bizarre Pokémon with but a single eye embedded in an iron sphere. I suspect this creature levitates due to the magnetism it emits from its arms, which resemble horseshoe-shaped magnets.
cobblemon.species.magneton.name: Магнетон
cobblemon.species.magneton.desc: Three Magnemite gathered to evolve into this Pokémon. The source of much vexation on my part, as its powerful magnetism destroys my research equipment.
cobblemon.species.farfetchd.name: Фарфетч’д
cobblemon.species.farfetchd.desc: They use a plant stalk as a weapon, but not all of them use it in the same way. Several distinct styles of stalk fighting have been observed.
cobblemon.species.doduo.name: Додуо
cobblemon.species.doduo.desc: Its short wings make flying difficult. Instead, this Pokémon runs at high speed on developed legs.
cobblemon.species.dodrio.name: Додрио
cobblemon.species.dodrio.desc: One of Doduo’s two heads splits to form a unique species. It runs close to 40 mph in prairies.
cobblemon.species.seel.name: Сил
cobblemon.species.seel.desc: Loves freezing-cold conditions. Relishes swimming in a frigid climate of around 14 degrees Fahrenheit.
cobblemon.species.dewgong.name: Дьюгонг
cobblemon.species.dewgong.desc: Its entire body is a snowy white. Unharmed by even intense cold, it swims powerfully in icy waters.
cobblemon.species.grimer.name: Граймер
cobblemon.species.grimer.desc: Made of congealed sludge. It smells too putrid to touch. Even weeds won’t grow in its path.
cobblemon.species.muk.name: Мак
cobblemon.species.muk.desc: Smells so awful, it can cause fainting. Through degeneration of its nose, it lost its sense of smell.
cobblemon.species.shellder.name: Шеллдер
cobblemon.species.shellder.desc: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.
cobblemon.species.cloyster.name: Клойстер
cobblemon.species.cloyster.desc: Once it slams its shell shut, it is impossible to open, even by those with superior strength.
cobblemon.species.gastly.name: Гастли
cobblemon.species.gastly.desc: Gaseous and completely impalpable. Also highly dangerous— inhaling part of its poisonous body will cause one to faint instantly.
cobblemon.species.haunter.name: Хонтер
cobblemon.species.haunter.desc: This frightful, malevolent spirit can glide through walls, appearing wherever it likes. According to rumor, victims of a Haunter's lick will wither to death day by day.
cobblemon.species.gengar.name: Генгар
cobblemon.species.gengar.desc: Possesses potential victims' shadows in an effort to steal away the victims' lives. If your shadow begins to laugh, you must take hold of a protective charm posthaste!
cobblemon.species.onix.name: Оникс
cobblemon.species.onix.desc: This chain of immense stones resembles a giant serpent. Tremors shake the earth above as it burrows deep beneath the ground, feeding on boulders as it goes.
cobblemon.species.drowzee.name: Драузи
cobblemon.species.drowzee.desc: If you sleep by it all the time, it will sometimes show you dreams it had eaten in the past.
cobblemon.species.hypno.name: Гипно
cobblemon.species.hypno.desc: Avoid eye contact if you come across one. It will try to put you to sleep by using its pendulum.
cobblemon.species.krabby.name: Крабби
cobblemon.species.krabby.desc: If it senses danger approaching, it cloaks itself with bubbles from its mouth so it will look bigger.
cobblemon.species.kingler.name: Кинглер
cobblemon.species.kingler.desc: Its oversized claw is very powerful, but when it’s not in battle, the claw just gets in the way.
cobblemon.species.voltorb.name: Волторб
cobblemon.species.voltorb.desc: An enigmatic Pokémon that happens to bear a resemblance to a Poké Ball. When excited, it discharges the electric current it has stored in its belly, then lets out a great, uproarious laugh.
cobblemon.species.electrode.name: Электрод
cobblemon.species.electrode.desc: The tissue on the surface of its body is curiously similar in composition to an Apricorn. When irritated, this Pokémon lets loose an electric current equal to 20 lightning bolts.
cobblemon.species.exeggcute.name: Экзекьют
cobblemon.species.exeggcute.desc: These Pokémon get nervous when they’re not in a group of six. The minute even one member of the group goes missing, Exeggcute become cowardly.
cobblemon.species.exeggutor.name: Экзекьютор
cobblemon.species.exeggutor.desc: When they work together, Exeggutor’s three heads can put out powerful psychic energy. Cloudy days make this Pokémon sluggish.
cobblemon.species.cubone.name: Кьюбон
cobblemon.species.cubone.desc: This Pokémon wears the skull of its deceased mother. Sometimes Cubone’s dreams make it cry, but each tear Cubone sheds makes it stronger.
cobblemon.species.marowak.name: Маровак
cobblemon.species.marowak.desc: When this Pokémon evolved, the skull of its mother fused to it. Marowak’s temperament also turned vicious at the same time.
cobblemon.species.hitmonlee.name: Хитмонли
cobblemon.species.hitmonlee.desc: The legs freely contract and stretch. The stretchy legs allow it to hit a distant foe with a rising kick.
cobblemon.species.hitmonchan.name: Хитмончан
cobblemon.species.hitmonchan.desc: Its punches slice the air. However, it seems to need a short break after fighting for three minutes.
cobblemon.species.lickitung.name: Ликитанг
cobblemon.species.lickitung.desc: Wields its long tongue deftly, as though it were an arm. The Pokémon's viscous saliva, once it has been collected and boiled down, yields a strong and highly useful adhesive.
cobblemon.species.koffing.name: Коффинг
cobblemon.species.koffing.desc: It adores polluted air. Some claim that Koffing used to be more plentiful in the Galar region than they are now.
cobblemon.species.weezing.name: Визинг
cobblemon.species.weezing.desc: It can’t suck in air quite as well as a Galarian Weezing, but the toxins it creates are more potent than those of its counterpart.
cobblemon.species.rhyhorn.name: Райхорн
cobblemon.species.rhyhorn.desc: Ludicrously strong—when it butts heads with a mountain, it is the mountain that shatters. But its short legs struggle with turns, and it is incapable of stopping unless it collides with something.
cobblemon.species.rhydon.name: Райдон
cobblemon.species.rhydon.desc: Rapidly rotates its horn to bore through bedrock. It swaggers around volcanic regions, protected from the lava's heat by its tough, armorlike hide.
cobblemon.species.chansey.name: Ченси
cobblemon.species.chansey.desc: This purehearted Pokémon shares its eggs with the injured.
cobblemon.species.tangela.name: Тангела
cobblemon.species.tangela.desc: It is cloaked entirely in blue vines, preventing any glimpse of its true identity. The vines impart a refreshing sensation when chewed—they're useful as a spice.
cobblemon.species.kangaskhan.name: Кангаскан
cobblemon.species.kangaskhan.desc: There are records of a lost human child being raised by a childless Kangaskhan.
cobblemon.species.horsea.name: Хорси
cobblemon.species.horsea.desc: They swim with dance-like motions and cause whirlpools to form. Horsea compete to see which of them can generate the biggest whirlpool.
cobblemon.species.seadra.name: Сидра
cobblemon.species.seadra.desc: Seadra’s mouth is slender, but its suction power is strong. In an instant, Seadra can suck in food that’s larger than the opening of its mouth.
cobblemon.species.goldeen.name: Голдин
cobblemon.species.goldeen.desc: Its dorsal and pectoral fins are strongly developed like muscles. It can swim at a speed of five knots.
cobblemon.species.seaking.name: Сикинг
cobblemon.species.seaking.desc: Using its horn, it bores holes in riverbed boulders, making nests to prevent its eggs from washing away.
cobblemon.species.staryu.name: Старью
cobblemon.species.staryu.desc: Fish Pokémon nibble at it, but Staryu isn’t bothered. Its body regenerates quickly, even if part of it is completely torn off.
cobblemon.species.starmie.name: Старми
cobblemon.species.starmie.desc: Starmie swims by spinning its body at high speed. As this Pokémon cruises through the ocean, it absorbs tiny plankton.
cobblemon.species.mrmime.name: Мистер Майм
cobblemon.species.mrmime.desc: The behavior of this clown-like Pokémon reminds one of pantomime. It creates invisible walls using a force emitted from its fingertips.
cobblemon.species.scyther.name: Сайтер
cobblemon.species.scyther.desc: The large, wickedly sharp scythes on its forearms are truly fearsome weapons. Prey's attempts to flee are unfailingly thwarted by this Pokémon's nimble motions.
cobblemon.species.jynx.name: Джинкс
cobblemon.species.jynx.desc: The Jynx of Galar often have beautiful and delicate voices. Some of these Pokémon have even gathered a fan base.
cobblemon.species.electabuzz.name: Электабазз
cobblemon.species.electabuzz.desc: Feeds on electrical energy. During sudden showers beneath looming thunderclouds, one can observe Electabuzz scaling tall trees, where the Pokémon will then wait for lightning to strike.
cobblemon.species.magmar.name: Магмар
cobblemon.species.magmar.desc: Legend has it that this Pokémon was born from the crater of a volcano. When wounded, it bathes in lava to heal its body, much as one would soak in a hot spring.
cobblemon.species.pinsir.name: Пинсир
cobblemon.species.pinsir.desc: This Pokémon clamps its pincers down on its prey and then either splits the prey in half or flings it away.
cobblemon.species.tauros.name: Таурос
cobblemon.species.tauros.desc: The Tauros of the Galar region are volatile in nature, and they won’t allow people to ride on their backs.
cobblemon.species.magikarp.name: Мэджикарп
cobblemon.species.magikarp.desc: A feeble, pitiful imbecile of a Pokémon that is nonetheless very hardy. Unperturbed by turbid water, it can be found living in all sorts of places.
cobblemon.species.gyarados.name: Гьярадос
cobblemon.species.gyarados.desc: I suspect this Pokémon to be the true identity of a dragon written of in ancient texts, which claimed that it razed an entire village with white-hot beams from its maw.
cobblemon.species.lapras.name: Лапрас
cobblemon.species.lapras.desc: Crossing icy seas is no issue for this cold-resistant Pokémon. Its smooth skin is a little cool to the touch.
cobblemon.species.ditto.name: Дитто
cobblemon.species.ditto.desc: When it encounters another Ditto, it will move faster than normal to duplicate that opponent exactly.
cobblemon.species.eevee.name: Иви
cobblemon.species.eevee.desc: Harbors the potential to evolve into manifold forms. Within Eevee lies the key to the mysteries of Pokémon evolution—I'm certain of it.
cobblemon.species.vaporeon.name: Вапореон
cobblemon.species.vaporeon.desc: Tests show that its cells closely resemble water molecules, which perhaps explains its ability to conceal its form while submerged. I believe the origins of mermaid folklore lie with this Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.jolteon.name: Джолтеон
cobblemon.species.jolteon.desc: Bristles its fur into sharp, needlelike points when enraged. One can hear electricity crackle in its breath when it exhales.
cobblemon.species.flareon.name: Флареон
cobblemon.species.flareon.desc: Flames burn within a saclike organ inside this Pokémon. When Flareon inhales, these flames grow in intensity, reaching a mighty 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.
cobblemon.species.porygon.name: Поригон
cobblemon.species.porygon.desc: It has no discernible heartbeat and does not seem to draw breath, and yet it appears to function without issue. I cannot even begin to explain this utterly bizarre anomaly.
cobblemon.species.omanyte.name: Оманайт
cobblemon.species.omanyte.desc: This Pokémon is a member of an ancient, extinct species. Omanyte paddles through water with its 10 tentacles, looking like it’s just drifting along.
cobblemon.species.omastar.name: Омастар
cobblemon.species.omastar.desc: Omastar’s sharp fangs could crush rock, but the Pokémon can attack only the prey that come within reach of its tentacles.
cobblemon.species.kabuto.name: Кабуто
cobblemon.species.kabuto.desc: While some say this species has gone extinct, Kabuto sightings are apparently fairly common in some places.
cobblemon.species.kabutops.name: Кабутопс
cobblemon.species.kabutops.desc: The cause behind the extinction of this species is unknown. Kabutops were aggressive Pokémon that inhabited warm seas.
cobblemon.species.aerodactyl.name: Аэродактиль
cobblemon.species.aerodactyl.desc: Aerodactyl’s sawlike fangs can shred skin to tatters—even the skin of Steel-type Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.snorlax.name: Снорлакс
cobblemon.species.snorlax.desc: This glutton appears in villages without warning and devours the entirety of their rice granaries—such occurrences have long been counted among the gravest of disasters.
cobblemon.species.articuno.name: Артикуно
