cobblemon.species.lillipup.desc: This Pokémon is far brighter than the average child, and Lillipup won’t forget the love it receives or any abuse it suffers.
cobblemon.species.herdier.name: Хердиер
cobblemon.species.herdier.desc: The black fur that covers this Pokémon’s body is dense and springy. Even sharp fangs bounce right off.
cobblemon.species.stoutland.name: Стаутлэнд
cobblemon.species.stoutland.desc: Stoutland is immensely proud of its impressive moustache. It’s said that moustache length is what determines social standing among this species.
cobblemon.species.purrloin.name: Пуррлойн
cobblemon.species.purrloin.desc: Opponents that get drawn in by its adorable behavior come away with stinging scratches from its claws and stinging pride from its laughter.
cobblemon.species.liepard.name: Лайпард
cobblemon.species.liepard.desc: This stealthy Pokémon sneaks up behind prey without making any sound at all. It competes with Thievul for territory.
cobblemon.species.pansage.name: Пансейдж
cobblemon.species.pansage.desc: It’s good at finding berries and gathers them from all over. It’s kind enough to share them with friends.
cobblemon.species.simisage.name: Симисейдж
cobblemon.species.simisage.desc: Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its barbed tail around wildly. The leaf growing on its head is very bitter.
cobblemon.species.pansear.name: Пансир
cobblemon.species.pansear.desc: This Pokémon lives in caves in volcanoes. The fire within the tuft on its head can reach 600 degrees Fahrenheit.
cobblemon.species.simisear.name: Симисир
cobblemon.species.simisear.desc: When it gets excited, embers rise from its head and tail and it gets hot. For some reason, it loves sweets.
cobblemon.species.panpour.name: Панпур
cobblemon.species.panpour.desc: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. Plants that receive its water grow large.
cobblemon.species.simipour.name: Симипур
cobblemon.species.simipour.desc: It prefers places with clean water. When its tuft runs low, it replenishes it by siphoning up water with its tail.
cobblemon.species.munna.name: Мунна
cobblemon.species.munna.desc: It eats dreams and releases mist. The mist is pink when it’s eating a good dream, and black when it’s eating a nightmare.
cobblemon.species.musharna.name: Мушарна
cobblemon.species.musharna.desc: It drowses and dreams all the time. It’s best to leave it be if it’s just woken up, as it’s a terrible grump when freshly roused from sleep.
cobblemon.species.pidove.name: Пидав
cobblemon.species.pidove.desc: It’s forgetful and not very bright, but many Trainers love it anyway for its friendliness and sincerity.
cobblemon.species.tranquill.name: Транквил
cobblemon.species.tranquill.desc: These bright Pokémon have acute memories. Apparently delivery workers often choose them as their partners.
cobblemon.species.unfezant.name: Анфезант
cobblemon.species.unfezant.desc: This Pokémon is intelligent and intensely proud. People will sit up and take notice if you become the Trainer of one.
cobblemon.species.blitzle.name: Блитзл
cobblemon.species.blitzle.desc: Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. They use the frequency and rhythm of these flashes to communicate.
cobblemon.species.zebstrika.name: Зебстрайка
cobblemon.species.zebstrika.desc: They have lightning-like movements. When Zebstrika run at full speed, the sound of thunder reverberates.
cobblemon.species.roggenrola.name: Роггенрола
cobblemon.species.roggenrola.desc: When it detects a noise, it starts to move. The energy core inside it makes this Pokémon slightly warm to the touch.
cobblemon.species.boldore.name: Болдор
cobblemon.species.boldore.desc: It relies on sound in order to monitor what’s in its vicinity. When angered, it will attack without ever changing the direction it’s facing.
cobblemon.species.gigalith.name: Гигалит
cobblemon.species.gigalith.desc: Although its energy blasts can blow away a dump truck, they have a limitation— they can only be fired when the sun is out.
cobblemon.species.woobat.name: Вубат
cobblemon.species.woobat.desc: It emits ultrasonic waves as it flutters about, searching for its prey—bug Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.swoobat.name: Свубат
cobblemon.species.swoobat.desc: The auspicious shape of this Pokémon’s nose apparently led some regions to consider Swoobat a symbol of good luck.
cobblemon.species.drilbur.name: Дрилбур
cobblemon.species.drilbur.desc: It’s a digger, using its claws to burrow through the ground. It causes damage to vegetable crops, so many farmers have little love for it.
cobblemon.species.excadrill.name: Экскадрилл
cobblemon.species.excadrill.desc: Known as the Drill King, this Pokémon can tunnel through the terrain at speeds of over 90 mph.
cobblemon.species.audino.name: Аудино
cobblemon.species.audino.desc: This Pokémon has a kind heart. By touching with its feelers, Audino can gauge other creatures’ feelings and physical conditions.
cobblemon.species.timburr.name: Тимбурр
cobblemon.species.timburr.desc: Timburr that have started carrying logs that are about three times their size are nearly ready to evolve.
cobblemon.species.gurdurr.name: Гурдурр
cobblemon.species.gurdurr.desc: Gurdurr excels at demolition—construction is not its forte. In any case, there’s skill in the way this Pokémon wields its metal beam.
cobblemon.species.conkeldurr.name: Конкелдурр
cobblemon.species.conkeldurr.desc: When going all out, this Pokémon throws aside its concrete pillars and leaps at opponents to pummel them with its fists.
cobblemon.species.tympole.name: Тимпол
cobblemon.species.tympole.desc: It uses sound waves to communicate with others of its kind. People and other Pokémon species can’t hear its cries of warning.
cobblemon.species.palpitoad.name: Палпитод
cobblemon.species.palpitoad.desc: On occasion, their cries are sublimely pleasing to the ear. Palpitoad with larger lumps on their bodies can sing with a wider range of sounds.
cobblemon.species.seismitoad.name: Сейсмитод
cobblemon.species.seismitoad.desc: This Pokémon is popular among the elderly, who say the vibrations of its lumps are great for massages.
cobblemon.species.throh.name: Тро
cobblemon.species.throh.desc: They train in groups of five. Any member that can’t keep up will discard its belt and leave the group.
cobblemon.species.sawk.name: Сок
cobblemon.species.sawk.desc: The karate chops of a Sawk that’s trained itself to the limit can cleave the ocean itself.
cobblemon.species.sewaddle.name: Севаддл
cobblemon.species.sewaddle.desc: Since this Pokémon makes its own clothes out of leaves, it is a popular mascot for fashion designers.
cobblemon.species.swadloon.name: Свадлун
cobblemon.species.swadloon.desc: It protects itself from the cold by wrapping up in leaves. It stays on the move, eating leaves in forests.
cobblemon.species.leavanny.name: Ливанни
cobblemon.species.leavanny.desc: It keeps its eggs warm with heat from fermenting leaves. It also uses leaves to make warm wrappings for Sewaddle.
cobblemon.species.venipede.name: Венипид
cobblemon.species.venipede.desc: Its fangs are highly venomous. If this Pokémon finds prey it thinks it can eat, it leaps for them without any thought of how things might turn out.
cobblemon.species.whirlipede.name: Вирлипид
cobblemon.species.whirlipede.desc: Whirlipede protects itself with a sturdy shell and poisonous spikes while it stores up the energy it’ll need for evolution.
cobblemon.species.scolipede.name: Сколипид
cobblemon.species.scolipede.desc: Scolipede engage in fierce territorial battles with Centiskorch. At the end of one of these battles, the victor makes a meal of the loser.
cobblemon.species.cottonee.name: Коттони
cobblemon.species.cottonee.desc: Weaving together the cotton of both Cottonee and Eldegoss produces exquisite cloth that’s highly prized by many luxury brands.
cobblemon.species.whimsicott.name: Вимзикотт
cobblemon.species.whimsicott.desc: As long as this Pokémon bathes in sunlight, its cotton keeps growing. If too much cotton fluff builds up, Whimsicott tears it off and scatters it.
cobblemon.species.petilil.name: Петилил
cobblemon.species.petilil.desc: The leaves on its head are highly valued for medicinal purposes. Dry the leaves in the sun, boil them, and then drink the bitter decoction for remarkably effective relief from fatigue.
cobblemon.species.lilligant.name: Лиллигант
cobblemon.species.lilligant.desc: I suspect that its well-developed legs are the result of a life spent on mountains covered in deep snow. The scent it exudes from its flower crown heartens those in proximity.
cobblemon.species.basculin.name: Баскулин
cobblemon.species.basculin.desc: Though it differs from other Basculin in several respects, including demeanor—this one is gentle—I have categorized it as a regional form given the vast array of shared qualities.
cobblemon.species.sandile.name: Сэндайл
cobblemon.species.sandile.desc: Sandile is small, but its legs and lower body are powerful. Pushing sand aside as it goes, Sandile moves through the desert as if it’s swimming.
cobblemon.species.krokorok.name: Крокорок
cobblemon.species.krokorok.desc: Although this Pokémon has specialized eyes that allow it to see in the dark, Krokorok won’t move much at night—the desert gets cold after sunset.
cobblemon.species.krookodile.name: Крукодайл
cobblemon.species.krookodile.desc: While terribly aggressive, Krookodile also has the patience to stay hidden under sand for days, lying in wait for prey.
cobblemon.species.darumaka.name: Дарумака
cobblemon.species.darumaka.desc: This popular symbol of good fortune will never fall over in its sleep, no matter how it’s pushed or pulled.
cobblemon.species.darmanitan.name: Дарманитан
cobblemon.species.darmanitan.desc: This Pokémon’s power level rises along with the temperature of its fire, which can reach 2,500 degrees Fahrenheit.
cobblemon.species.maractus.name: Марактус
cobblemon.species.maractus.desc: Once each year, this Pokémon scatters its seeds. They’re jam-packed with nutrients, making them a precious food source out in the desert.
cobblemon.species.dwebble.name: Двеббл
cobblemon.species.dwebble.desc: It first tries to find a rock to live in, but if there are no suitable rocks to be found, Dwebble may move in to the ports of a Hippowdon.
cobblemon.species.crustle.name: Крастл
cobblemon.species.crustle.desc: Its thick claws are its greatest weapons. They’re mighty enough to crack Rhyperior’s carapace.
cobblemon.species.scraggy.name: Скрегги
cobblemon.species.scraggy.desc: It protects itself with its durable skin. It’s thought that this Pokémon will evolve once its skin has completely stretched out.
cobblemon.species.scrafty.name: Скрафти
cobblemon.species.scrafty.desc: While mostly known for having the temperament of an aggressive ruffian, this Pokémon takes very good care of its family, friends, and territory.
cobblemon.species.sigilyph.name: Сигилиф
cobblemon.species.sigilyph.desc: A discovery was made in the desert where Sigilyph fly. The ruins of what may have been an ancient city were found beneath the sands.
cobblemon.species.yamask.name: Ямаск
cobblemon.species.yamask.desc: The spirit of a person from a bygone age became this Pokémon. It rambles through ruins, searching for someone who knows its face.
cobblemon.species.cofagrigus.name: Кофагригус
cobblemon.species.cofagrigus.desc: There are many depictions of Cofagrigus decorating ancient tombs. They’re symbols of the wealth that kings of bygone eras had.
cobblemon.species.tirtouga.name: Тиртуга
cobblemon.species.tirtouga.desc: Tirtouga is considered to be the ancestor of many turtle Pokémon. It was restored to life from a fossil.
cobblemon.species.carracosta.name: Карракоста
cobblemon.species.carracosta.desc: This Pokémon emerges from the water in search of prey despite the fact that it moves more slowly on land.
cobblemon.species.archen.name: Архен
cobblemon.species.archen.desc: Archen is said to be the ancestor of bird Pokémon. It lived in treetops, eating berries and bug Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.archeops.name: Археопс
cobblemon.species.archeops.desc: Though capable of flight, Archeops was apparently better at hunting on the ground.
cobblemon.species.trubbish.name: Траббиш
cobblemon.species.trubbish.desc: This Pokémon was born from a bag stuffed with trash. Galarian Weezing relish the fumes belched by Trubbish.
cobblemon.species.garbodor.name: Гарбодор
cobblemon.species.garbodor.desc: The toxic liquid it launches from its right arm is so virulent that it can kill a weakened creature instantly.
cobblemon.species.zorua.name: Зоруа
cobblemon.species.zorua.desc: A once-departed soul, returned to life in Hisui. Derives power from resentment, which rises as energy atop its head and takes on the forms of foes. In this way, Zorua vents lingering malice.
cobblemon.species.zoroark.name: Зороарк
cobblemon.species.zoroark.desc: With its disheveled white fur, it looks like an embodiment of death. Heedless of its own safety, Zoroark attacks its nemeses with a bitter energy so intense, it lacerates Zoroark's own body.
cobblemon.species.minccino.name: Минччино
cobblemon.species.minccino.desc: They pet each other with their tails as a form of greeting. Of the two, the one whose tail is fluffier is a bit more boastful.
cobblemon.species.cinccino.name: Чинччино
cobblemon.species.cinccino.desc: A special oil that seeps through their fur helps them avoid attacks. The oil fetches a high price at market.
cobblemon.species.gothita.name: Готита
cobblemon.species.gothita.desc: Even when nobody seems to be around, Gothita can still be heard making a muted cry. Many believe it’s speaking to something only it can see.
cobblemon.species.gothorita.name: Готорита
cobblemon.species.gothorita.desc: On nights when the stars shine, this Pokémon’s psychic power is at its strongest. It’s unknown just what link Gothorita has to the greater universe.
cobblemon.species.gothitelle.name: Гофителль
cobblemon.species.gothitelle.desc: A criminal who was shown his fate by a Gothitelle went missing that same day and was never seen again.
cobblemon.species.solosis.name: Солосис
cobblemon.species.solosis.desc: Many say that the special liquid covering this Pokémon’s body would allow it to survive in the vacuum of space.
cobblemon.species.duosion.name: Дуоужн
cobblemon.species.duosion.desc: Its brain has split into two, and the two halves rarely think alike. Its actions are utterly unpredictable.
cobblemon.species.reuniclus.name: Реюниклус
cobblemon.species.reuniclus.desc: It’s said that drinking the liquid surrounding Reuniclus grants wisdom. Problem is, the liquid is highly toxic to anything besides Reuniclus itself.
cobblemon.species.ducklett.name: Даклетт
cobblemon.species.ducklett.desc: They are better at swimming than flying, and they happily eat their favorite food, peat moss, as they dive underwater.
cobblemon.species.swanna.name: Сванна
cobblemon.species.swanna.desc: Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in the middle is the leader of the flock.
cobblemon.species.vanillite.name: Ваниллайт
cobblemon.species.vanillite.desc: Supposedly, this Pokémon was born from an icicle. It spews out freezing air at −58 degrees Fahrenheit to make itself more comfortable.
cobblemon.species.vanillish.name: Ваниллиш
cobblemon.species.vanillish.desc: It blasts enemies with cold air reaching −148 degrees Fahrenheit, freezing them solid. But it spares their lives afterward—it’s a kind Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.vanilluxe.name: Ваниллюкс
cobblemon.species.vanilluxe.desc: People believe this Pokémon formed when two Vanillish stuck together. Its body temperature is roughly 21 degrees Fahrenheit.
cobblemon.species.deerling.name: Дирлинг
cobblemon.species.deerling.desc: The turning of the seasons changes the color and scent of this Pokémon’s fur. People use it to mark the seasons.
cobblemon.species.sawsbuck.name: Сосбак
cobblemon.species.sawsbuck.desc: They migrate according to the seasons, so some people call Sawsbuck the harbingers of spring.
cobblemon.species.emolga.name: Эмолга
cobblemon.species.emolga.desc: This Pokémon absolutely loves sweet berries. Sometimes it stuffs its cheeks full of so much food that it can’t fly properly.
cobblemon.species.karrablast.name: Каррабласт
cobblemon.species.karrablast.desc: It spits a liquid from its mouth to melt through Shelmet’s shell. Karrablast doesn’t eat the shell— it eats only the contents.
cobblemon.species.escavalier.name: Эскавалир
cobblemon.species.escavalier.desc: It charges its enemies, lances at the ready. An image of one of its duels is captured in a famous painting of Escavalier clashing with Sirfetch’d.
cobblemon.species.foongus.name: Фунгус
cobblemon.species.foongus.desc: The spores released from this Pokémon’s hands are highly poisonous, but when thoroughly dried, the spores can be used as stomach medicine.
cobblemon.species.amoonguss.name: Амунгус
cobblemon.species.amoonguss.desc: Amoonguss generally doesn’t move much. It tends to stand still near Poké Balls that have been dropped on the ground.
cobblemon.species.frillish.name: Фриллиш
cobblemon.species.frillish.desc: Legend has it that the residents of a sunken ancient city changed into these Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.jellicent.name: Джеллисент
cobblemon.species.jellicent.desc: Whenever a full moon hangs in the night sky, schools of Jellicent gather near the surface of the sea, waiting for their prey to appear.
cobblemon.species.alomomola.name: Аломомола
cobblemon.species.alomomola.desc: The reason it helps Pokémon in a weakened condition is that any Pokémon coming after them may also attack Alomomola.
cobblemon.species.joltik.name: Джолтик
cobblemon.species.joltik.desc: Joltik latch on to other Pokémon and suck out static electricity. They’re often found sticking to Yamper’s hindquarters.
cobblemon.species.galvantula.name: Гальвантула
cobblemon.species.galvantula.desc: It lays traps of electrified threads near the nests of bird Pokémon, aiming to snare chicks that are not yet good at flying.
cobblemon.species.ferroseed.name: Ферросид
cobblemon.species.ferroseed.desc: Mossy caves are their preferred dwellings. Enzymes contained in mosses help Ferroseed’s spikes grow big and strong.
cobblemon.species.ferrothorn.name: Ферроторн
cobblemon.species.ferrothorn.desc: Its spikes are harder than steel. This Pokémon crawls across rock walls by stabbing the spikes on its feelers into the stone.
cobblemon.species.klink.name: Клинк
cobblemon.species.klink.desc: It’s suspected that Klink were the inspiration behind ancient people’s invention of the first gears.
cobblemon.species.klang.name: Кланг
cobblemon.species.klang.desc: Many companies in the Galar region choose Klang as their logo. This Pokémon is considered the symbol of industrial technology.
cobblemon.species.klinklang.name: Клинкланг
cobblemon.species.klinklang.desc: The three gears that compose this Pokémon spin at high speed. Its new spiked gear isn’t a living creature.
cobblemon.species.tynamo.name: Тайнамо
cobblemon.species.tynamo.desc: One alone can emit only a trickle of electricity, so a group of them gathers to unleash a powerful electric shock.
cobblemon.species.eelektrik.name: Илектрик
cobblemon.species.eelektrik.desc: These Pokémon have a big appetite. When they spot their prey, they attack it and paralyze it with electricity.
cobblemon.species.eelektross.name: Илектросс
cobblemon.species.eelektross.desc: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean.
cobblemon.species.elgyem.name: Элджием
cobblemon.species.elgyem.desc: This Pokémon was discovered about 50 years ago. Its highly developed brain enables it to exert its psychic powers.
cobblemon.species.beheeyem.name: Бихием
cobblemon.species.beheeyem.desc: Sometimes found drifting above wheat fields, this Pokémon can control the memories of its opponents.
cobblemon.species.litwick.name: Литвик
cobblemon.species.litwick.desc: The younger the life this Pokémon absorbs, the brighter and eerier the flame on its head burns.
cobblemon.species.lampent.name: Лампент
cobblemon.species.lampent.desc: It lurks in cities, pretending to be a lamp. Once it finds someone whose death is near, it will trail quietly after them.
cobblemon.species.chandelure.name: Шанделюр
cobblemon.species.chandelure.desc: In homes illuminated by Chandelure instead of lights, funerals were a constant occurrence— or so it’s said.
cobblemon.species.axew.name: Аксью
cobblemon.species.axew.desc: They play with each other by knocking their large tusks together. Their tusks break sometimes, but they grow back so quickly that it isn’t a concern.
cobblemon.species.fraxure.name: Фрэкшур
cobblemon.species.fraxure.desc: Its skin is as hard as a suit of armor. Fraxure’s favorite strategy is to tackle its opponents, stabbing them with its tusks at the same time.
cobblemon.species.haxorus.name: Хаксорус
cobblemon.species.haxorus.desc: While usually kindhearted, it can be terrifying if angered. Tusks that can slice through steel beams are how Haxorus deals with its adversaries.
cobblemon.species.cubchoo.name: Кабчу
cobblemon.species.cubchoo.desc: It sniffles before performing a move, using its frosty snot to provide an icy element to any move that needs it.
cobblemon.species.beartic.name: Бертик
cobblemon.species.beartic.desc: It swims energetically through frigid seas. When it gets tired, it freezes the seawater with its breath so it can rest on the ice.
cobblemon.species.cryogonal.name: Крайогонал
cobblemon.species.cryogonal.desc: When the weather gets hot, these Pokémon turn into water vapor. Cryogonal are almost never seen during summer.
cobblemon.species.shelmet.name: Шелмет
cobblemon.species.shelmet.desc: It has a strange physiology that responds to electricity. When together with Karrablast, Shelmet evolves for some reason.
cobblemon.species.accelgor.name: Ассельгор
cobblemon.species.accelgor.desc: Discarding its shell made it nimble. To keep itself from dehydrating, it wraps its body in bands of membrane.
cobblemon.species.stunfisk.name: Станфиск
cobblemon.species.stunfisk.desc: For some reason, this Pokémon smiles slightly when it emits a strong electric current from the yellow markings on its body.
cobblemon.species.mienfoo.name: Мьенфу
cobblemon.species.mienfoo.desc: Though small, Mienfoo’s temperament is fierce. Any creature that approaches Mienfoo carelessly will be greeted with a flurry of graceful attacks.
cobblemon.species.mienshao.name: Мьеншао
cobblemon.species.mienshao.desc: Delivered at blinding speeds, kicks from this Pokémon can shatter massive boulders into tiny pieces.
cobblemon.species.druddigon.name: Драддигон
cobblemon.species.druddigon.desc: Druddigon are vicious and cunning. They take up residence in nests dug out by other Pokémon, treating the stolen nests as their own lairs.
cobblemon.species.golett.name: Голем
cobblemon.species.golett.desc: This Pokémon was created from clay. It received orders from its master many thousands of years ago, and it still follows those orders to this day.
cobblemon.species.golurk.name: Голурк
cobblemon.species.golurk.desc: There’s a theory that inside Golurk is a perpetual motion machine that produces limitless energy, but this belief hasn’t been proven.
cobblemon.species.pawniard.name: Паньярд
cobblemon.species.pawniard.desc: A pack of these Pokémon forms to serve a Bisharp boss. Each Pawniard trains diligently, dreaming of one day taking the lead.
cobblemon.species.bisharp.name: Бишарп
cobblemon.species.bisharp.desc: Violent conflicts erupt between Bisharp and Fraxure over places where sharpening stones can be found.
cobblemon.species.bouffalant.name: Буффалант
cobblemon.species.bouffalant.desc: These Pokémon live in herds of about 20 individuals. Bouffalant that betray the herd will lose the hair on their heads for some reason.
cobblemon.species.rufflet.name: Раффлет
cobblemon.species.rufflet.desc: Its chick-like looks belie its hotheadedness. It challenges its parents at every opportunity, desperate to prove its strength.
cobblemon.species.braviary.name: Брейвиари
cobblemon.species.braviary.desc: Screaming a bloodcurdling battle cry, this huge and ferocious bird Pokémon goes out on the hunt. It blasts lakes with shock waves, then scoops up any prey that float to the water's surface.
cobblemon.species.vullaby.name: Вуллаби
cobblemon.species.vullaby.desc: Vullaby grow quickly. Bones that have gotten too small for older Vullaby to wear often get passed down to younger ones in the nest.
cobblemon.species.mandibuzz.name: Мандибазз
cobblemon.species.mandibuzz.desc: They adorn themselves with bones. There seem to be fashion trends among them, as different bones come into and fall out of popularity.
cobblemon.species.heatmor.name: Хитмор
cobblemon.species.heatmor.desc: A flame serves as its tongue, melting through the hard shell of Durant so that Heatmor can devour their insides.
cobblemon.species.durant.name: Дюрант
cobblemon.species.durant.desc: With their large mandibles, these Pokémon can crunch their way through rock. They work together to protect their eggs from Sandaconda.
cobblemon.species.deino.name: Дейно
cobblemon.species.deino.desc: Because it can’t see, this Pokémon is constantly biting at everything it touches, trying to keep track of its surroundings.
cobblemon.species.zweilous.name: Звайлос
cobblemon.species.zweilous.desc: Their two heads will fight each other over a single piece of food. Zweilous are covered in scars even without battling others.
cobblemon.species.hydreigon.name: Гидрайгон
cobblemon.species.hydreigon.desc: The three heads take turns sinking their teeth into the opponent. Their attacks won’t slow until their target goes down.
cobblemon.species.larvesta.name: Ларвеста
cobblemon.species.larvesta.desc: Larvesta’s body is warm all over. It spouts fire from the tips of its horns to intimidate predators and scare prey.
cobblemon.species.volcarona.name: Волкарона
cobblemon.species.volcarona.desc: This Pokémon emerges from a cocoon formed of raging flames. Ancient murals depict Volcarona as a deity of fire.
cobblemon.species.cobalion.name: Кобалион
cobblemon.species.cobalion.desc: From the moment it’s born, this Pokémon radiates the air of a leader. Its presence will calm even vicious foes.
cobblemon.species.terrakion.name: Терракион
cobblemon.species.terrakion.desc: In Unovan legend, Terrakion battled against humans in an effort to protect other Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.virizion.name: Виризион
cobblemon.species.virizion.desc: It darts around opponents with a flurry of quick movements, slicing them up with its horns.
cobblemon.species.tornadus.name: Торнадус
cobblemon.species.tornadus.desc: This storm-stirring Pokémon is said to cause the seasons to turn by whipping up the air. I suspect its humanlike form to be a false one.
cobblemon.species.thundurus.name: Тандорус
cobblemon.species.thundurus.desc: They say this wielder of electricity has waged war with its nemesis, Tornadus, since time immemorial. The lightning bolts it hurls pierce the very earth and enrich the soil.
cobblemon.species.reshiram.name: Реширам
cobblemon.species.reshiram.desc:
Этот Покемон упоминается в легендах. Он выпускает пламя из своего хвоста, сжигая всё вокруг. (Black)

Когда хвост Реширама вспыхивает, его жар меняет атмосферу и погоду в мире. (White)

Этот легендарный Покемон может испепелить мир своим огнём. Он помогает тем, кто хочет построить мир правды. (Black 2/White2)
cobblemon.species.zekrom.name: Зекром
cobblemon.species.zekrom.desc: Mythology tells us that if people lose the righteousness in their hearts, their kingdoms will be razed by Zekrom’s lightning.
cobblemon.species.landorus.name: Ландорус
cobblemon.species.landorus.desc: When the incarnations of wind and of lightning clash, Landorus arrives to quell the conflict. After the tempests and thunderbolts abate, the land is sure to be blessed with bountiful harvests.
cobblemon.species.kyurem.name: Кьюрем
cobblemon.species.kyurem.desc: It appears that this Pokémon uses its powers over ice to freeze its own body in order to stabilize its cellular structure.
cobblemon.species.keldeo.name: Кельдео
cobblemon.species.keldeo.desc: They say that Keldeo must survive harsh battles and fully develop the horn on its forehead before this Pokémon’s true power will awaken.
cobblemon.species.meloetta.name: Мелоэтта
cobblemon.species.meloetta.desc: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.
cobblemon.species.genesect.name: Генесект
cobblemon.species.genesect.desc: This Pokémon existed 300 million years ago. Team Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.
cobblemon.species.chespin.name: Чеспин
cobblemon.species.chespin.desc: Such a thick shell of wood covers its head and back that even a direct hit from a truck wouldn’t faze it.
cobblemon.species.quilladin.name: Квилладин
cobblemon.species.quilladin.desc: They strengthen their lower bodies by running into one another. They are very kind and won’t start fights.
cobblemon.species.chesnaught.name: Чеснот
cobblemon.species.chesnaught.desc: When it takes a defensive posture with its fists guarding its face, it could withstand a bomb blast.
cobblemon.species.fennekin.name: Феннекин
cobblemon.species.fennekin.desc: As it walks, it munches on a twig in place of a snack. It intimidates opponents by puffing hot air out of its ears.
cobblemon.species.braixen.name: Брейксен
cobblemon.species.braixen.desc: When the twig is plucked from its tail, friction sets the twig alight. The flame is used to send signals to its allies.
cobblemon.species.delphox.name: Дельфокс
cobblemon.species.delphox.desc: Using psychic power, it generates a fiery vortex of 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit, incinerating foes swept into this whirl of flame.
cobblemon.species.froakie.name: Фроки
cobblemon.species.froakie.desc: It protects its skin by covering its body in delicate bubbles. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air, it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.
cobblemon.species.frogadier.name: Фрогадир
cobblemon.species.frogadier.desc: Its swiftness is unparalleled. It can scale a tower of more than 2,000 feet in a minute’s time.
cobblemon.species.greninja.name: Грениндзя
cobblemon.species.greninja.desc: It appears and vanishes with a ninja’s grace. It toys with its enemies using swift movements, while slicing them with throwing stars of sharpest water.
cobblemon.species.bunnelby.name: Баннелби
cobblemon.species.bunnelby.desc: It’s very sensitive to danger. The sound of Corviknight’s flapping will have Bunnelby digging a hole to hide underground in moments.
cobblemon.species.diggersby.name: Диггерсби
cobblemon.species.diggersby.desc: The fur on its belly retains heat exceptionally well. People used to make heavy winter clothing from fur shed by this Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.fletchling.name: Флетчлинг
cobblemon.species.fletchling.desc: When this Pokémon gets excited, its body temperature increases sharply. If you touch a Fletchling with bare hands, you might get burned.
cobblemon.species.fletchinder.name: Флетчлиндер
cobblemon.species.fletchinder.desc: Fletchinder are exceedingly territorial and aggressive. These Pokémon fight among themselves over feeding grounds.
cobblemon.species.talonflame.name: Талонфлейм
cobblemon.species.talonflame.desc: Talonflame dives toward prey at speeds of up to 310 mph and assaults them with powerful kicks, giving the prey no chance to escape.
cobblemon.species.scatterbug.name: Скаттербаг
cobblemon.species.scatterbug.desc: The powder that covers its body regulates its temperature, so it can live in any region or climate.
cobblemon.species.spewpa.name: Спьюпа
cobblemon.species.spewpa.desc: The beaks of bird Pokémon can’t begin to scratch its stalwart body. To defend itself, it spews powder.
cobblemon.species.vivillon.name: Вивийон
cobblemon.species.vivillon.desc: The patterns on this Pokémon’s wings depend on the climate and topography of its habitat. It scatters colorful scales.
cobblemon.species.litleo.name: Литлео
cobblemon.species.litleo.desc: This hot-blooded Pokémon is filled with curiosity. When it gets angry or starts fighting, its short mane gets hot.
cobblemon.species.pyroar.name: Пайроар
cobblemon.species.pyroar.desc: The temperature of its breath is over 10,000 degrees Fahrenheit, but Pyroar doesn’t use it on its prey. This Pokémon prefers to eat raw meat.
cobblemon.species.flabebe.name: Флабебе
cobblemon.species.flabebe.desc: Flabébé wears a crown made from pollen it’s collected from its flower. The crown has hidden healing properties.
cobblemon.species.floette.name: Флоэтт
cobblemon.species.floette.desc: It gives its own power to flowers, pouring its heart into caring for them. Floette never forgives anyone who messes up a flower bed.
cobblemon.species.florges.name: Флорджес
cobblemon.species.florges.desc: Its life can span several hundred years. It’s said to devote its entire life to protecting gardens.
cobblemon.species.skiddo.name: Скиддо
cobblemon.species.skiddo.desc: If it has sunshine and water, it doesn’t need to eat, because it can generate energy from the leaves on its back.
cobblemon.species.gogoat.name: Гогоат
cobblemon.species.gogoat.desc: They inhabit mountainous regions. The leader of the herd is decided by a battle of clashing horns.
cobblemon.species.pancham.name: Панчам
cobblemon.species.pancham.desc: Wanting to make sure it’s taken seriously, Pancham’s always giving others a glare. But if it’s not focusing, it ends up smiling.
cobblemon.species.pangoro.name: Пангоро
cobblemon.species.pangoro.desc: Using its leaf, Pangoro can predict the moves of its opponents. It strikes with punches that can turn a dump truck into scrap with just one hit.
cobblemon.species.furfrou.name: Фурфру
cobblemon.species.furfrou.desc: Left alone, its fur will grow longer and longer, but it will only allow someone it trusts to cut it.
cobblemon.species.espurr.name: Эспурр
cobblemon.species.espurr.desc: There’s enough psychic power in Espurr to send a wrestler flying, but because this power can’t be controlled, Espurr finds it troublesome.
cobblemon.species.meowstic.name: Мяустик
cobblemon.species.meowstic.desc: The defensive instinct of the males is strong. It’s when they’re protecting themselves or their partners that they unleash their full power.
cobblemon.species.honedge.name: Хонедж
cobblemon.species.honedge.desc: The blue eye on the sword’s handguard is the true body of Honedge. With its old cloth, it drains people’s lives away.
cobblemon.species.doublade.name: Дублейд
cobblemon.species.doublade.desc: The two swords employ a strategy of rapidly alternating between offense and defense to bring down their prey.
cobblemon.species.aegislash.name: Эйджислеш
cobblemon.species.aegislash.desc: Its potent spectral powers allow it to manipulate others. It once used its powers to force people and Pokémon to build a kingdom to its liking.
cobblemon.species.spritzee.name: Спритзи
cobblemon.species.spritzee.desc: The scent its body gives off enraptures those who smell it. Noble ladies had no shortage of love for Spritzee.
cobblemon.species.aromatisse.name: Ароматисс
cobblemon.species.aromatisse.desc: The scents Aromatisse can produce range from sweet smells that bolster allies to foul smells that sap an opponent’s will to fight.
cobblemon.species.swirlix.name: Свирликс
cobblemon.species.swirlix.desc: The sweet smell of cotton candy perfumes Swirlix’s fluffy fur. This Pokémon spits out sticky string to tangle up its enemies.
cobblemon.species.slurpuff.name: Слёрпафф
cobblemon.species.slurpuff.desc: Slurpuff’s fur contains a lot of air, making it soft to the touch and lighter than it looks.
cobblemon.species.inkay.name: Инкей
cobblemon.species.inkay.desc: By exposing foes to the blinking of its luminescent spots, Inkay demoralizes them, and then it seizes the chance to flee.
cobblemon.species.malamar.name: Маламар
cobblemon.species.malamar.desc: It’s said that Malamar’s hypnotic powers played a role in certain history-changing events.
cobblemon.species.binacle.name: Байнакл
cobblemon.species.binacle.desc: If the two don’t work well together, both their offense and defense fall apart. Without good teamwork, they won’t survive.
cobblemon.species.barbaracle.name: Барбаракл
cobblemon.species.barbaracle.desc: Having an eye on each palm allows it to keep watch in all directions. In a pinch, its limbs start to act on their own to ensure the enemy’s defeat.
cobblemon.species.skrelp.name: Скрелп
cobblemon.species.skrelp.desc: Skrelp looks like a piece of rotten seaweed, so it can blend in with seaweed drifting on the ocean and avoid being detected by enemies.
cobblemon.species.dragalge.name: Драгалджи
cobblemon.species.dragalge.desc: Dragalge generates dragon energy by sticking the plume on its head out above the ocean’s surface and bathing it in sunlight.
cobblemon.species.clauncher.name: Клаунчер
cobblemon.species.clauncher.desc: By detonating gas that accumulates in its right claw, this Pokémon launches water like a bullet. This is how Clauncher defeats its enemies.
cobblemon.species.clawitzer.name: Кловитзер
cobblemon.species.clawitzer.desc: Clawitzer’s right arm is a cannon that launches projectiles made of seawater. Shots from a Clawitzer’s cannon arm can sink a tanker.
cobblemon.species.helioptile.name: Хелиоптайл
cobblemon.species.helioptile.desc: The sun powers this Pokémon’s electricity generation. Interruption of that process stresses Helioptile to the point of weakness.
cobblemon.species.heliolisk.name: Хелиолиск
cobblemon.species.heliolisk.desc: One Heliolisk basking in the sun with its frill outspread is all it would take to produce enough electricity to power a city.
cobblemon.species.tyrunt.name: Тайрант
cobblemon.species.tyrunt.desc: This Pokémon is selfish and likes to be pampered. It can also inflict grievous wounds on its Trainer just by playing around.
cobblemon.species.tyrantrum.name: Тайрантрум
cobblemon.species.tyrantrum.desc: A single bite of Tyrantrum’s massive jaws will demolish a car. This Pokémon was the king of the ancient world.
cobblemon.species.amaura.name: Амаура
cobblemon.species.amaura.desc: Amaura is an ancient Pokémon that has gone extinct. Specimens of this species can sometimes be found frozen in ice.
cobblemon.species.aurorus.name: Аврорус
cobblemon.species.aurorus.desc: When gripped by rage, Aurorus will emanate freezing air, covering everything around it in ice.
cobblemon.species.sylveon.name: Сильвеон
cobblemon.species.sylveon.desc: It emits a soothing aura from its ribbon-shaped organs. It wraps these appendages around quarrelers to instantly restore calm to the situation.
cobblemon.species.hawlucha.name: Хаулуча
cobblemon.species.hawlucha.desc: It always strikes a pose before going for its finishing move. Sometimes opponents take advantage of that time to counterattack.
cobblemon.species.dedenne.name: Деденне
cobblemon.species.dedenne.desc: Since Dedenne can’t generate much electricity on its own, it steals electricity from outlets or other electric Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.carbink.name: Карбинк
cobblemon.species.carbink.desc: It’s said that somewhere in the world, there’s a mineral vein housing a large pack of slumbering Carbink. It’s also said that this pack has a queen.
cobblemon.species.goomy.name: Гуми
cobblemon.species.goomy.desc: Goomy hides away in the shade of trees, where it's nice and humid. If the slime coating its body dries out, the Pokémon instantly becomes lethargic.
cobblemon.species.sliggoo.name: Слиггу
cobblemon.species.sliggoo.desc: A creature given to melancholy. I suspect its metallic shell developed as a result of the mucus on its skin reacting with the iron in Hisui's water.
cobblemon.species.goodra.name: Гудра
cobblemon.species.goodra.desc: Able to freely control the hardness of its metallic shell. It loathes solitude and is extremely clingy—it will fume and run riot if those dearest to it ever leave its side.
cobblemon.species.klefki.name: Клефки
cobblemon.species.klefki.desc: Klefki sucks in metal ions with the horn topping its head. It seems this Pokémon loves keys so much that its head needed to look like one, too.
cobblemon.species.phantump.name: Фантамп
cobblemon.species.phantump.desc: With a voice like a human child’s, it cries out to lure adults deep into the forest, getting them lost among the trees.
cobblemon.species.trevenant.name: Травенант
cobblemon.species.trevenant.desc: Small roots that extend from the tips of this Pokémon’s feet can tie into the trees of the forest and give Trevenant control over them.
cobblemon.species.pumpkaboo.name: Пампкабу
cobblemon.species.pumpkaboo.desc: The light that streams out from the holes in the pumpkin can hypnotize and control the people and Pokémon that see it.
cobblemon.species.gourgeist.name: Горгайст
cobblemon.species.gourgeist.desc: In the darkness of a new-moon night, Gourgeist will come knocking. Whoever answers the door will be swept off to the afterlife.
cobblemon.species.bergmite.name: Бергмайт
cobblemon.species.bergmite.desc: Lives on mountains blanketed in perennial snow. It freezes water vapor in the air to make the ice helmet that it dons for defense.
cobblemon.species.avalugg.name: Авалагг
cobblemon.species.avalugg.desc: The armor of ice covering its lower jaw puts steel to shame and can shatter rocks with ease. This Pokémon barrels along steep mountain paths, cleaving through the deep snow.
cobblemon.species.noibat.name: Нойбат
cobblemon.species.noibat.desc: No wavelength of sound is beyond Noibat’s ability to produce. The ultrasonic waves it generates can overcome much larger Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.noivern.name: Нойверн
cobblemon.species.noivern.desc: Flying through the darkness, it weakens enemies with ultrasonic waves that could crush stone. Its fangs finish the fight.
cobblemon.species.xerneas.name: Зирнеас
cobblemon.species.xerneas.desc: When the horns on its head shine in seven colors, it is said to be sharing everlasting life.
cobblemon.species.yveltal.name: Ивелтал
cobblemon.species.yveltal.desc: When its life comes to an end, it absorbs the life energy of every living thing and turns into a cocoon once more.
cobblemon.species.zygarde.name: Зайгард
cobblemon.species.zygarde.desc: Some say it can change to an even more powerful form when battling those who threaten the ecosystem.
cobblemon.species.diancie.name: Дианси
cobblemon.species.diancie.desc: It can instantly create many diamonds by compressing the carbon in the air between its hands.
cobblemon.species.hoopa.name: Хупа
cobblemon.species.hoopa.desc: It is said to be able to seize anything it desires with its six rings and six huge arms. With its power sealed, it is transformed into a much smaller form.
cobblemon.species.volcanion.name: Волканьон
cobblemon.species.volcanion.desc: It expels its internal steam from the arms on its back. It has enough power to blow away a mountain.
cobblemon.species.rowlet.name: Роулет
cobblemon.species.rowlet.desc: Flies noiselessly on delicate wings. It has mastered the art of deftly launching dagger-sharp feathers from those same wings.
cobblemon.species.dartrix.name: Дартрикс
cobblemon.species.dartrix.desc: Regularly basks in sunlight to gather power—presumably due to the frigid climate. Nonetheless, the edges of the blade quills set into its wings are keen as ever.
cobblemon.species.decidueye.name: Десиджуай
cobblemon.species.decidueye.desc: The air stored inside the rachises of Decidueye's feathers insulates the Pokémon against Hisui's extreme cold. This is firm proof that evolution can be influenced by environment.
cobblemon.species.litten.name: Литтен
cobblemon.species.litten.desc: Trying to pet Litten before it trusts you will result in a nasty scratch from its sharp claws. Be careful.
cobblemon.species.torracat.name: Торракэт
cobblemon.species.torracat.desc: When facing a powerful enemy, Torracat’s fighting spirit gets pumped up, and its fire bell blazes hotter.
cobblemon.species.incineroar.name: Инсинерор
cobblemon.species.incineroar.desc: Incineroar’s rough and aggressive behavior is its most notable trait, but the way it helps out small Pokémon shows that it has a kind side as well.
cobblemon.species.popplio.name: Попплио
cobblemon.species.popplio.desc: If Popplio want to create big, powerful balloons, they must be persistent. It takes daily practice for these Pokémon to develop their skills.
cobblemon.species.brionne.name: Брионн
cobblemon.species.brionne.desc: On nights when the sea is calm, Brionne dance with one another to the singing of the Primarina that’s leading them.
cobblemon.species.primarina.name: Примарина
cobblemon.species.primarina.desc: For Primarina, every battle’s a stage. Its singing and the dancing of its balloons will mesmerize the audience.
cobblemon.species.pikipek.name: Пикипек
cobblemon.species.pikipek.desc: It may look spindly, but its neck muscles are heavy-duty. It can peck at a tree 16 times per second!
cobblemon.species.trumbeak.name: Трамбик
cobblemon.species.trumbeak.desc: From its mouth, it fires the seeds of berries it has eaten. The scattered seeds give rise to new plants.
cobblemon.species.toucannon.name: Туканнон
cobblemon.species.toucannon.desc: Known for forming harmonious couples, this Pokémon is brought to wedding ceremonies as a good luck charm.
cobblemon.species.yungoos.name: Янгус
cobblemon.species.yungoos.desc: Although it will eat anything, it prefers fresh living things, so it marches down streets in search of prey.
cobblemon.species.gumshoos.name: Гамшус
cobblemon.species.gumshoos.desc: Patient by nature, this Pokémon loses control of itself and pounces when it spots its favorite meal—Rattata!
cobblemon.species.grubbin.name: Граббин
cobblemon.species.grubbin.desc: It uses its big jaws to dig nests into the forest floor, and it loves to feed on sweet tree sap.
cobblemon.species.charjabug.name: Чарджабаг
cobblemon.species.charjabug.desc: Its digestive processes convert the leaves it eats into electricity. An electric sac in its belly stores the electricity for later use.
cobblemon.species.vikavolt.name: Викавольт
cobblemon.species.vikavolt.desc: If it carries a Charjabug to use as a spare battery, a flying Vikavolt can rapidly fire high-powered beams of electricity.
cobblemon.species.crabrawler.name: Крабравлер
cobblemon.species.crabrawler.desc: Crabrawler has been known to mistake Exeggutor for a coconut tree and climb it. The enraged Exeggutor shakes it off and stomps it.
cobblemon.species.crabominable.name: Крабоминабл
cobblemon.species.crabominable.desc: Before it stops to think, it just starts pummeling. There are records of its turning back avalanches with a flurry of punches.
cobblemon.species.oricorio.name: Орикорио
cobblemon.species.oricorio.desc: This Oricorio has drunk red nectar. If its Trainer gives the wrong order, this passionate Pokémon becomes fiercely angry.
cobblemon.species.cutiefly.name: Кьютифлай
cobblemon.species.cutiefly.desc: An opponent’s aura can tell Cutiefly what that opponent’s next move will be. Then Cutiefly can glide around the attack and strike back.
cobblemon.species.ribombee.name: Рибомби
cobblemon.species.ribombee.desc: Ribombee absolutely hate getting wet or rained on. In the cloudy Galar region, they are very seldom seen.
cobblemon.species.rockruff.name: Рокрафф
cobblemon.species.rockruff.desc: This Pokémon intimidates opponents by striking the ground with the rocks on its neck. The moment an opponent flinches, Rockruff attacks.
cobblemon.species.lycanroc.name: Ликанрок
cobblemon.species.lycanroc.desc: With swift movements, this Pokémon gradually backs its prey into a corner. Lycanroc’s fangs are always aimed toward opponents’ weak spots.
cobblemon.species.wishiwashi.name: Вишиваши
cobblemon.species.wishiwashi.desc: When it senses danger, its eyes tear up. The sparkle of its tears signals other Wishiwashi to gather.
cobblemon.species.mareanie.name: Марини
cobblemon.species.mareanie.desc: Unlike their Alolan counterparts, the Mareanie of the Galar region have not yet figured out that the branches of Corsola are delicious.
cobblemon.species.toxapex.name: Токсапекс
cobblemon.species.toxapex.desc: Within the poison sac in its body is a poison so toxic that Pokémon as large as Wailord will still be suffering three days after it first takes effect.
cobblemon.species.mudbray.name: Мадбрей
cobblemon.species.mudbray.desc: It eats dirt to create mud and smears this mud all over its feet, giving them the grip needed to walk on rough terrain without slipping.
cobblemon.species.mudsdale.name: Мадсдейл
cobblemon.species.mudsdale.desc: Mudsdale has so much stamina that it could carry over 10 tons across the Galar region without rest or sleep.
cobblemon.species.dewpider.name: Дьюпайдер
cobblemon.species.dewpider.desc: Dewpider normally lives underwater. When it comes onto land in search of food, it takes water with it in the form of a bubble on its head.
cobblemon.species.araquanid.name: Аракванид
cobblemon.species.araquanid.desc: It acts as a caretaker for Dewpider, putting them inside its bubble and letting them eat any leftover food.
cobblemon.species.fomantis.name: Фомантис
cobblemon.species.fomantis.desc: During the day, Fomantis basks in sunlight and sleeps peacefully. It wakes and moves around at night.
cobblemon.species.lurantis.name: Люрантис
cobblemon.species.lurantis.desc: The petals on this Pokémon’s arms are thin and super sharp, and they can fire laser beams if Lurantis gathers light first.
cobblemon.species.morelull.name: Морелулл
cobblemon.species.morelull.desc: Morelull live in forests that stay dark even during the day. They scatter flickering spores that put enemies to sleep.
cobblemon.species.shiinotic.name: Шинотик
cobblemon.species.shiinotic.desc: If you see a light deep in a forest at night, don’t go near. Shiinotic will make you fall fast asleep.
cobblemon.species.salandit.name: Саландит
cobblemon.species.salandit.desc: This sneaky Pokémon will slink behind its prey and immobilize it with poisonous gas before the prey even realizes Salandit is there.
cobblemon.species.salazzle.name: Салаззл
cobblemon.species.salazzle.desc: The winner of competitions between Salazzle is decided by which one has the most male Salandit with it.
cobblemon.species.stufful.name: Стаффул
cobblemon.species.stufful.desc: The way it protects itself by flailing its arms may be an adorable sight, but stay well away. This is flailing that can snap thick tree trunks.
cobblemon.species.bewear.name: Бевэр
cobblemon.species.bewear.desc: The moves it uses to take down its prey would make a martial artist jealous. It tucks subdued prey under its arms to carry them to its nest.
cobblemon.species.bounsweet.name: Баунсвит
cobblemon.species.bounsweet.desc: When under attack, it secretes a sweet and delicious sweat. The scent only calls more enemies to it.
cobblemon.species.steenee.name: Стини
cobblemon.species.steenee.desc: Any Corvisquire that pecks at this Pokémon will be greeted with a smack from its sepals followed by a sharp kick.
cobblemon.species.tsareena.name: Царина
cobblemon.species.tsareena.desc: A kick from the hardened tips of this Pokémon’s legs leaves a wound in the opponent’s body and soul that will never heal.
cobblemon.species.comfey.name: Комфей
cobblemon.species.comfey.desc: These Pokémon smell very nice. All Comfey wear different flowers, so each of these Pokémon has its own individual scent.
cobblemon.species.oranguru.name: Орангуру
cobblemon.species.oranguru.desc: It knows the forest inside and out. If it comes across a wounded Pokémon, Oranguru will gather medicinal herbs to treat it.
cobblemon.species.passimian.name: Пассимиан
cobblemon.species.passimian.desc: Passimian live in groups of about 20, with each member performing an assigned role. Through cooperation, the group survives.
cobblemon.species.wimpod.name: Вимпод
cobblemon.species.wimpod.desc: Wimpod gather in swarms, constantly on the lookout for danger. They scatter the moment they detect an enemy’s presence.
cobblemon.species.golisopod.name: Голисопод
cobblemon.species.golisopod.desc: They live in sunken ships or in holes in the seabed. When Golisopod and Grapploct battle, the loser becomes the winner’s meal.
cobblemon.species.sandygast.name: Сэндигаст
cobblemon.species.sandygast.desc: Sandygast mainly inhabits beaches. It takes control of anyone who puts their hand into its mouth, forcing them to make its body bigger.
cobblemon.species.palossand.name: Палоссэнд
cobblemon.species.palossand.desc: This Pokémon lives on beaches, but it hates water. Palossand can’t maintain its castle-like shape if it gets drenched by a heavy rain.
cobblemon.species.pyukumuku.name: Пьюкумуку
cobblemon.species.pyukumuku.desc: It lives in warm, shallow waters. If it encounters a foe, it will spit out its internal organs as a means to punch them.
cobblemon.species.typenull.name: Тип: Ноль
cobblemon.species.typenull.desc: It was modeled after a mighty Pokémon of myth. The mask placed upon it limits its power in order to keep it under control.
cobblemon.species.silvally.name: Сильвалли
cobblemon.species.silvally.desc: The final factor needed to release this Pokémon’s true power was a strong bond with a Trainer it trusts.
cobblemon.species.minior.name: Миниор
cobblemon.species.minior.desc: Although its outer shell is uncommonly durable, the shock of falling to the ground smashes the shell to smithereens.
cobblemon.species.komala.name: Комала
cobblemon.species.komala.desc: It remains asleep from birth to death as a result of the sedative properties of the leaves that form its diet.
cobblemon.species.turtonator.name: Туртонатор
cobblemon.species.turtonator.desc: Eating sulfur in its volcanic habitat is what causes explosive compounds to develop in its shell. Its droppings are also dangerously explosive.
cobblemon.species.togedemaru.name: Тогедемару
cobblemon.species.togedemaru.desc: When it’s in trouble, it curls up into a ball, makes its fur spikes stand on end, and then discharges electricity indiscriminately.
cobblemon.species.mimikyu.name: Мимикью
cobblemon.species.mimikyu.desc: There was a scientist who peeked under Mimikyu’s old rag in the name of research. The scientist died of a mysterious disease.
cobblemon.species.bruxish.name: Браксиш
cobblemon.species.bruxish.desc: Its skin is thick enough to fend off Mareanie’s spikes. With its robust teeth, Bruxish crunches up the spikes and eats them.
cobblemon.species.drampa.name: Дрампа
cobblemon.species.drampa.desc: Drampa is a kind and friendly Pokémon—up until it’s angered. When that happens, it stirs up a gale and flattens everything around.
cobblemon.species.dhelmise.name: Делмайз
cobblemon.species.dhelmise.desc: After lowering its anchor, it waits for its prey. It catches large Wailord and drains their life-force.
cobblemon.species.jangmoo.name: Джангмо-о
cobblemon.species.jangmoo.desc: Jangmo-o strikes its scales to communicate with others of its kind. Its scales are actually fur that’s become as hard as metal.
cobblemon.species.hakamoo.name: Хакамо-о
cobblemon.species.hakamoo.desc: Before attacking its enemies, it clashes its scales together and roars. Its sharp claws shred the opposition.
cobblemon.species.kommoo.name: Коммо-о
cobblemon.species.kommoo.desc: Certain ruins have paintings of ancient warriors wearing armor made of Kommo-o scales.
cobblemon.species.tapukoko.name: Тапу Коко
cobblemon.species.tapukoko.desc: The lightning-wielding guardian deity of Melemele, Tapu Koko is brimming with curiosity and appears before people from time to time.
cobblemon.species.tapulele.name: Тапу Леле
cobblemon.species.tapulele.desc: Although called a guardian deity, Tapu Lele is devoid of guilt about its cruel disposition and can be described as nature incarnate.
cobblemon.species.tapubulu.name: Тапу Булу
cobblemon.species.tapubulu.desc: It makes ringing sounds with its tail to let others know where it is, avoiding unneeded conflicts. This guardian deity of Ula’ula controls plants.
cobblemon.species.tapufini.name: Тапу Фини
cobblemon.species.tapufini.desc: Although it’s called a guardian deity, terrible calamities sometimes befall those who recklessly approach Tapu Fini.
cobblemon.species.cosmog.name: Космог
cobblemon.species.cosmog.desc: Cosmog is very curious but not very cautious, often placing itself in danger. If things start to look dicey, it teleports away.
cobblemon.species.cosmoem.name: Космоэм
cobblemon.species.cosmoem.desc: It sucks in dust from the air at an astounding rate, frantically building up energy within its core as preparation for evolution.
cobblemon.species.solgaleo.name: Солгалео
cobblemon.species.solgaleo.desc: Solgaleo was once known as the Beast That Devours the Sun. Energy in the form of light radiates boundlessly from it.
cobblemon.species.lunala.name: Лунала
cobblemon.species.lunala.desc: It steals the light from its surroundings and then becomes the full moon, showering its own light across the night sky.
cobblemon.species.nihilego.name: Нихилего
cobblemon.species.nihilego.desc: It appeared in this world from an Ultra Wormhole. Nihilego appears to be a parasite that lives by feeding on people and Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.buzzwole.name: Баззвол
cobblemon.species.buzzwole.desc: Buzzwole goes around showing off its abnormally swollen muscles. It is one kind of Ultra Beast.
cobblemon.species.pheromosa.name: Феромоса
cobblemon.species.pheromosa.desc: Although it’s alien to this world and a danger here, it’s apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
cobblemon.species.xurkitree.name: Зюркитри
cobblemon.species.xurkitree.desc: They’ve been dubbed Ultra Beasts. Some of them stand unmoving, like trees, with their arms and legs stuck into the ground.
cobblemon.species.celesteela.name: Селестила
cobblemon.species.celesteela.desc: Although it’s alien to this world and a danger here, it’s apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
cobblemon.species.kartana.name: Картана
cobblemon.species.kartana.desc: Although it’s alien to this world and a danger here, it’s apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
cobblemon.species.guzzlord.name: Газзлорд
cobblemon.species.guzzlord.desc: An unknown life-form called a UB. It may be constantly hungry—it is certainly always devouring something.
cobblemon.species.necrozma.name: Некрозма
cobblemon.species.necrozma.desc: It needs light to survive, and it goes on a rampage seeking it out. Its laser beams will cut anything to pieces.
cobblemon.species.magearna.name: Магирна
cobblemon.species.magearna.desc: Built roughly 500 years ago by a scientist, the part called the Soul-Heart is the actual life-form.
cobblemon.species.marshadow.name: Маршадоу
cobblemon.species.marshadow.desc: This Pokémon can conceal itself in any shadow, so it went undiscovered for a long time.
cobblemon.species.poipole.name: Пойпол
cobblemon.species.poipole.desc: An Ultra Beast that lives in a different world, it cackles wildly as it sprays its opponents with poison from the needles on its head.
cobblemon.species.naganadel.name: Наганадел
cobblemon.species.naganadel.desc: One kind of Ultra Beast, it fires a glowing, venomous liquid from its needles. This liquid is also immensely adhesive.
cobblemon.species.stakataka.name: Стакатака
cobblemon.species.stakataka.desc: When stone walls started moving and attacking, the brute’s true identity was this mysterious life-form, which brings to mind an Ultra Beast.
cobblemon.species.blacephalon.name: Бласефалон
cobblemon.species.blacephalon.desc: A UB that appeared from an Ultra Wormhole, it causes explosions, then takes advantage of opponents’ surprise to rob them of their vitality.
cobblemon.species.zeraora.name: Зераора
cobblemon.species.zeraora.desc: Electricity sparks from the pads on its limbs. Wherever Zeraora runs, lightning flashes and thunder echoes.
cobblemon.species.meltan.name: Мелтан
cobblemon.species.meltan.desc: They live as a group, but when the time comes, one strong Meltan will absorb all the others and evolve.
cobblemon.species.melmetal.name: Мелметал
cobblemon.species.melmetal.desc: Centrifugal force is behind the punches of Melmetal’s heavy hex-nut arms. Melmetal is said to deliver the strongest punches of all Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.grookey.name: Груки
cobblemon.species.grookey.desc: It attacks with rapid beats of its stick. As it strikes with amazing speed, it gets more and more pumped.
cobblemon.species.thwackey.name: Тваки
cobblemon.species.thwackey.desc: When it’s drumming out rapid beats in battle, it gets so caught up in the rhythm that it won’t even notice that it’s already knocked out its opponent.
cobblemon.species.rillaboom.name: Риллабум
cobblemon.species.rillaboom.desc: The one with the best drumming techniques becomes the boss of the troop. It has a gentle disposition and values harmony among its group.
cobblemon.species.scorbunny.name: Скорбанни
cobblemon.species.scorbunny.desc: It has special pads on the backs of its feet, and one on its nose. Once it’s raring to fight, these pads radiate tremendous heat.
cobblemon.species.raboot.name: Рабут
cobblemon.species.raboot.desc: It kicks berries right off the branches of trees and then juggles them with its feet, practicing its footwork.
cobblemon.species.cinderace.name: Синдерейс
cobblemon.species.cinderace.desc: It’s skilled at both offense and defense, and it gets pumped up when cheered on. But if it starts showboating, it could put itself in a tough spot.
cobblemon.species.sobble.name: Соббл
cobblemon.species.sobble.desc: When it gets wet, its skin changes color, and this Pokémon becomes invisible as if it were camouflaged.
cobblemon.species.drizzile.name: Дриззайл
cobblemon.species.drizzile.desc: Highly intelligent but also very lazy, it keeps enemies out of its territory by laying traps everywhere.
cobblemon.species.inteleon.name: Интелеон
cobblemon.species.inteleon.desc: Its nictitating membranes let it pick out foes’ weak points so it can precisely blast them with water that shoots from its fingertips at Mach 3.
cobblemon.species.skwovet.name: Сквовет
cobblemon.species.skwovet.desc: It eats berries nonstop—a habit that has made it more resilient than it looks. It’ll show up on farms, searching for yet more berries.
cobblemon.species.greedent.name: Гридент
cobblemon.species.greedent.desc: Common throughout the Galar region, this Pokémon has strong teeth and can chew through the toughest of berry shells.
cobblemon.species.rookidee.name: Рукиди
cobblemon.species.rookidee.desc: Jumping nimbly about, this small-bodied Pokémon takes advantage of even the slightest opportunity to disorient larger opponents.
cobblemon.species.corvisquire.name: Корвисквайр
cobblemon.species.corvisquire.desc: The lessons of many harsh battles have taught it how to accurately judge an opponent’s strength.
cobblemon.species.corviknight.name: Корвинайт
cobblemon.species.corviknight.desc: With their great intellect and flying skills, these Pokémon very successfully act as the Galar region’s airborne taxi service.
cobblemon.species.blipbug.name: Блипбаг
cobblemon.species.blipbug.desc: Often found in gardens, this Pokémon has hairs on its body that it uses to assess its surroundings.
cobblemon.species.dottler.name: Доттлер
cobblemon.species.dottler.desc: As it grows inside its shell, it uses its psychic abilities to monitor the outside world and prepare for evolution.
cobblemon.species.orbeetle.name: Орбитл
cobblemon.species.orbeetle.desc: It emits psychic energy to observe and study what’s around it—and what’s around it can include things over six miles away.
cobblemon.species.nickit.name: Никит
cobblemon.species.nickit.desc: Cunning and cautious, this Pokémon survives by stealing food from others. It erases its tracks with swipes of its tail as it makes off with its plunder.
cobblemon.species.thievul.name: Фивул
cobblemon.species.thievul.desc: With a lithe body and sharp claws, it goes around stealing food and eggs. Boltund is its natural enemy.
cobblemon.species.gossifleur.name: Госсифлор
cobblemon.species.gossifleur.desc: It whirls around in the wind while singing a joyous song. This delightful display has charmed many into raising this Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.eldegoss.name: Эльдегосс
cobblemon.species.eldegoss.desc: The cotton on the head of this Pokémon can be spun into a glossy, gorgeous yarn—a Galar regional specialty.
cobblemon.species.wooloo.name: Вулу
cobblemon.species.wooloo.desc: If its fleece grows too long, Wooloo won’t be able to move. Cloth made with the wool of this Pokémon is surprisingly strong.
cobblemon.species.dubwool.name: Дабвул
cobblemon.species.dubwool.desc: Its majestic horns are meant only to impress the opposite gender. They never see use in battle.
cobblemon.species.chewtle.name: Чютл
cobblemon.species.chewtle.desc: It starts off battles by attacking with its rock-hard horn, but as soon as the opponent flinches, this Pokémon bites down and never lets go.
cobblemon.species.drednaw.name: Дредноу
cobblemon.species.drednaw.desc: This Pokémon rapidly extends its retractable neck to sink its sharp fangs into distant enemies and take them down.
cobblemon.species.yamper.name: Ямпер
cobblemon.species.yamper.desc: This gluttonous Pokémon only assists people with their work because it wants treats. As it runs, it crackles with electricity.
cobblemon.species.boltund.name: Болтанд
cobblemon.species.boltund.desc: It sends electricity through its legs to boost their strength. Running at top speed, it easily breaks 50 mph.
cobblemon.species.rolycoly.name: Роликоли
cobblemon.species.rolycoly.desc: It can race around like a unicycle, even on rough, rocky terrain. Burning coal sustains it.
cobblemon.species.carkol.name: Каркол
cobblemon.species.carkol.desc: By rapidly rolling its legs, it can travel at over 18 mph. The temperature of the flames it breathes exceeds 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit.
cobblemon.species.coalossal.name: Колоссал
cobblemon.species.coalossal.desc: While it’s engaged in battle, its mountain of coal will burn bright red, sending off sparks that scorch the surrounding area.
cobblemon.species.applin.name: Эпплин
cobblemon.species.applin.desc: As soon as it’s born, it burrows into an apple. Not only does the apple serve as its food source, but the flavor of the fruit determines its evolution.
cobblemon.species.flapple.name: Флэппл
cobblemon.species.flapple.desc: It flies on wings of apple skin and spits a powerful acid. It can also change its shape into that of an apple.
cobblemon.species.appletun.name: Эпплтан
cobblemon.species.appletun.desc: Its body is covered in sweet nectar, and the skin on its back is especially yummy. Children used to have it as a snack.
cobblemon.species.silicobra.name: Силикобра
cobblemon.species.silicobra.desc: It spews sand from its nostrils. While the enemy is blinded, it burrows into the ground to hide.
cobblemon.species.sandaconda.name: Сандаконда
cobblemon.species.sandaconda.desc: Its unique style of coiling allows it to blast sand out of its sand sac more efficiently.
cobblemon.species.cramorant.name: Краморант
cobblemon.species.cramorant.desc: This hungry Pokémon swallows Arrokuda whole. Occasionally, it makes a mistake and tries to swallow a Pokémon other than its preferred prey.
cobblemon.species.arrokuda.name: Аррокуда
cobblemon.species.arrokuda.desc:
Если этот Покемон замечает какое-либо движение вокруг себя, он сразу же бросается на цель, выставив вперёд свою остроконечную челюсть. Он очень гордится этой челюстью. (Pokémon Sword)

После того, как он наелся, его движения становятся крайне вялыми. В такие моменты его подхватывает Краморант. (Pokémon Shield)

Аррокуда может быстро плавать только по прямой. Те из них, которые становятся вялыми от переедания, первыми подвергаются нападению от стай Ваттрелов. (Pokémon Scarlet)

Он повергает добычу, набрасываясь на неё твердой, острой челюстью. Но у Аррокуды плохое зрение, поэтому такая тактика малоуспешна. (Pokémon Violet)
cobblemon.species.barraskewda.name: Барраскьюда
cobblemon.species.barraskewda.desc:
У этого Покемона челюсти острые, как копьё, и прочные, как сталь. А ещё у Барраскьюды удивительно вкусная плоть. (Pokémon Sword)

Он вращает хвостовыми плавниками, разгоняясь до скорости более 185 километров в час, а затем таранит добычу и вонзается в неё. (Pokémon Shield)

Он вращает хвостовыми плавниками, выпрыгивая из воды, а затем злобно кусает Вингаллов, пролетающих близко к поверхности воды. (Pokémon Scarlet)

Он плавает со скоростью более 185 километров в час и ожесточённо сражается со стаями Финизен за добычу. (Pokémon Violet)
cobblemon.species.toxel.name: Токсель
cobblemon.species.toxel.desc:
Он хранит яд во внутреннем ядовитом мешке и выделяет его через кожу. Если вы прикоснётесь к этому Покемону, то почувствуете покалывание. (Pokémon Sword)

Манипулируя химическим составом своего яда, он вырабатывает электричество. Его напряжение слабое, но оно может вызвать паралич с покалыванием. (Pokémon Shield)

Он без проблем пьёт грязную воду. Орган внутри тела Токселя фильтрует такую воду в ядовитую жидкость, которая безвредна для Токселя. (Pokémon Scarlet)

Этот эгоистичный, жаждущий внимания Покемон хранит яд и электричество в двух разных мешочках внутри своего тела. (Pokémon Violet)
cobblemon.species.toxtricity.name: Токстрисити
cobblemon.species.toxtricity.desc:
Когда этот Покемон издает звук, как будто играет на гитаре, он на самом деле дёргает выступы на груди, чтобы выработать электричество. (Pokémon Sword)

Этот вспыльчивый и агрессивный Покемон набирает застоявшуюся воду, чтобы поглотить все токсины, которые она может содержать. (Pokémon Shield)

Когда он рассеивает токсичный пот и излучает электричество, мелодия, звучащая словно из гитары, разносится по округе. (Pokémon Scarlet)

Разряды электричества, которые он пускает, яростно ударяя по выступам на груди, легко превышают 15,000 вольт. (Pokémon Violet)
cobblemon.species.sizzlipede.name: Сиззлипид
cobblemon.species.sizzlipede.desc:
Он накапливает в своем теле горючий газ и использует его для выделения тепла. Особенно сильно нагреваются жёлтые участки на брюхе. (Pokémon Sword)

Он обволакивает добычу своим горячим телом, готовя её в своих спиралях. Когда они хорошо прожарятся, он прожорливо обгладывает их до последнего кусочка. (Pokémon Shield)
cobblemon.species.centiskorch.name: Сентискорч
cobblemon.species.centiskorch.desc:
Когда он нагревается, температура его тела достигает примерно 800 градусов по Цельсию. Он размахивает своим телом, как кнутом, и бросается на врагов. (Pokémon Sword)

Хотя его горящее тело уже само по себе опасно, у этого чрезмерно враждебного Покемона есть ещё и большие и очень острые клыки. (Pokémon Shield)
cobblemon.species.clobbopus.name: Клоббопус
cobblemon.species.clobbopus.desc:
Он очень любопытен, но для исследования предметов он бьёт их своими щупальцами. Он выходит на сушу в поисках пищи. (Pokémon Sword)

Его щупальца легко отрываются, но его это не пугает, ведь он знает, что они отрастут. По уму он равен трёхлетнему ребёнку. (Pokémon Shield)
cobblemon.species.grapploct.name: Грапплокт
cobblemon.species.grapploct.desc:
Тело, состоящее из одних мышц, делает захваты, которые этот Покемон выполняет с помощью своих щупалец, невероятно мощными. (Pokémon Sword)

В поисках противника, с которым можно испытать свои силы, он выходит на сушу. Как только битва заканчивается, он возвращается в море. (Pokémon Shield)
cobblemon.species.sinistea.name: Синисти
cobblemon.species.sinistea.desc:
Считается, что этот Покемон появился на свет, когда одинокий дух завладел остывшей чашкой чая. (Pokémon Sword)

Чашка, в которой живет этот Покемон, — известный предмет антикварной посуды. В обороте находится множество подделок. (Pokémon Shield)

Душа того, кто умер в одиночестве, овладела остатками чая. Этот Покемон появляется в гостиницах и домах. (Pokémon Scarlet)

Синисти попадает в организм, когда вы пьёте его, и затем крадёт вашу жизненную силу изнутри. А ещё он ужасен на вкус. (Pokémon Violet)
cobblemon.species.polteageist.name: Полтигайст
cobblemon.species.polteageist.desc:
Этот вид обитает в старинных чайниках. Большинство чайников — подделки, но в редких случаях встречаются и подлинные работы. (Pokémon Sword)

Если оставить чёрный чай без присмотра, то этот Покемон может прийти и налить себя в чай, превратив его в нового Полтигайста. (Pokémon Shield)

Чай, из которого состоит тело Полтигайста, обладает ярко выраженным и приятным вкусом. Однако, если выпить слишком много, это может привести к летальному исходу. (Pokémon Scarlet)

Эти Покемоны размножаются, пробираясь в заварочные чайники и выливая себя в остатки чая. (Pokémon Violet)
cobblemon.species.hatenna.name: Хаттена
cobblemon.species.hatenna.desc:
Благодаря выступу на голове он чувствует эмоции других существ. Если вы не отличаетесь спокойным нравом, он никогда не привыкнет к вам. (Pokémon Sword)

Если этот Покемон почувствует сильную эмоцию, он убежит так быстро, как только сможет. Он предпочитает места, где нет людей. (Pokémon Shield)

Поскольку эмоции других людей постоянно проникают в его голову, этот Покемон предпочитает места, где не живут другие существа. (Pokémon Scarlet)

Он ощущает чувства других живых существ. Будьте осторожны, и не подвергайте его сильным эмоциям слишком долго, иначе он устанет. (Pokémon Violet)
cobblemon.species.hattrem.name: Хаттрем
cobblemon.species.hattrem.desc:
Неважно, кто вы, но если вы придёте с сильными эмоциями к этому Покемону, он жестоко заставит вас замолчать. (Pokémon Sword)

С помощью косичек на голове он бьёт врагов, чтобы заставить их угомониться. Один удар этих косичек может отправить в нокаут профессионального боксёра. (Pokémon Shield)

Для этого Покемона сильные эмоции ощущаются как невероятно громкие звуки — даже если эти эмоции счастливые. (Pokémon Scarlet)

Как только этот Покемон обнаружит кого-нибудь, кто излучает сильные эмоции, он будет колотить его своими косами до потери сознания, чтобы заставить успокоиться. (Pokémon Violet)
cobblemon.species.hatterene.name: Хаттерин
cobblemon.species.hatterene.desc:
Он излучает психическую силу, достаточно сильную, чтобы вызывать головную боль и отпугивать чужих. (Pokémon Sword)

Если вы будете слишком сильно шуметь рядом с ним, то рискуете быть разорванным когтями на его щупальце. Этот Покемон также известен как "Лесная ведьма". (Pokémon Shield)

Хаттерин уничтожает тех, кто вторгается в его родной лес, взрывая их лучом, а затем нанося удары когтями, усиленными психической силой. (Pokémon Scarlet)

Остерегайтесь лесов, в которых нет признаков живых существ. Возможно, вы забрели на территорию Хаттерин. (Pokémon Violet)
cobblemon.species.impidimp.name: Импидимп
cobblemon.species.impidimp.desc:
Через нос он всасывает эмоции, выделяемые людьми и Покемонами, когда они чувствуют себя раздражёнными. Он питается этой негативной энергией. (Pokémon Sword)

Он проникает в дома людей, крадёт вещи и питается негативной энергией расстроенных жильцов. (Pokémon Shield)

Причина, по которой этот Покемон доставляет неприятности близким людям, заключается в том, что Импидимп сам становится раздражительным, если не может поглощать негативные эмоции. (Pokémon Scarlet)

Они живут группами, донимая и разыгрывая друг друга, чтобы отточить своё мастерство доставлять неприятности. (Pokémon Violet)
cobblemon.species.morgrem.name: Моргрем
cobblemon.species.morgrem.desc:
Когда он опускается на четвереньки, словно прося прощения, он пытается заманить противников, чтобы проткнуть их своими копьевидными волосами. (Pokémon Sword)

С помощью хитрости он пытается заманить людей в лес. Некоторые верят, что он способен заставить расти урожай. (Pokémon Shield)

Моргрем предпочитает грязные тактики, например засады, потому что не уверен в своей силе. (Pokémon Scarlet)

Этот Покемон поглощает негативные эмоции и превращает их в энергию. Он популярен среди людей, склонных к мрачным мыслям. (Pokémon Violet)
cobblemon.species.grimmsnarl.name: Гриммснарл
cobblemon.species.grimmsnarl.desc:
Волосы, обвивающие его тело, способствуют укреплению мышц, поэтому этот Покемон может одолеть даже Мачампа. (Pokémon Sword)

Его волоски работают как мышечные волокна. Когда волоски разворачиваются, они цепляются за противников, опутывая их, как щупальца. (Pokémon Shield)

Этот Покемон полностью контролирует свои волосы. Обычно Гриммснарл обматывает волосы вокруг тела, чтобы поддержать мышцы. (Pokémon Scarlet)

Он живёт глубоко в лесу. Даже превратившись в эту великолепную форму, он не отказался от своих мелких проступков и шалостей. (Pokémon Violet)
cobblemon.species.obstagoon.name: Обстагун
cobblemon.species.obstagoon.desc:
Его голос поражает своей громкостью. Обстагун имеет склонность принимать угрожающую позу и кричать — этот приём известен как Препятствие. (Pokémon Sword)

Он эволюционировал после многочисленных схваток. Скрестив руки, он издает крик, который заставит вздрогнуть любого противника. (Pokémon Shield)
cobblemon.species.perrserker.name: Перрсеркер
cobblemon.species.perrserker.desc:
То, что кажется железным шлемом, на самом деле является закалёнными волосами. Этот Покемон живёт ради острых ощущений в бою. (Pokémon Sword)

После многих сражений у него появились опасные когти, которые, удлиняясь, образуют кинжалы. (Pokémon Shield)
cobblemon.species.cursola.name: Кёрсола
cobblemon.species.cursola.desc:
Его оболочка переполнена повышенной потусторонней энергией. Эктоплазма служит защитой для основного духа этого Покемона. (Pokémon Sword)

Будьте осторожны с эктоплазменным телом, окружающим его душу. Если вы прикоснетесь к нему, то станете неподвижным, как камень. (Pokémon Shield)
cobblemon.species.sirfetchd.name: Сирфетч’д
cobblemon.species.sirfetchd.desc:
Эту эволюцию могут получить только Фарфетч'ды, пережившие много сражений. Когда лук этого Покемона увядает, он уходит в отставку. (Pokémon Sword)

Отражая атаки своим жёстким щитом из листьев, он наносит ответный удар своим острым стеблем лука-порея. Стебель лука-порея является и оружием, и едой. (Pokémon Shield)
cobblemon.species.mrrime.name: Мистер Райм
cobblemon.species.mrrime.desc:
Он очень искусен в чечётке. Он взмахивает ледяной тростью в такт своим грациозным движениям. (Pokémon Sword)

Благодаря своим забавным движениям он очень популярен. Свою психическую силу он высвобождает из узора на животе. (Pokémon Shield)
cobblemon.species.runerigus.name: Рунеригус
cobblemon.species.runerigus.desc:
В древнюю картину было вплетено могущественное проклятие. Впитав в себя дух Ямаска, картина начала двигаться. (Pokémon Sword)

Никогда не прикасайтесь к его телу, похожему на тень, иначе вам откроются ужасные воспоминания, скрывающиеся за вырезанным на нём изображением. (Pokémon Shield)
cobblemon.species.milcery.name: Милсери
cobblemon.species.milcery.desc:
Этот Покемон родился из сладковатых частиц воздуха. Его тело состоит из крема. (Pokémon Sword)

Говорят, что любую кондитерскую, которую посещает Милсери, ожидает успех и удача. (Pokémon Shield)

Чем больше сладких ароматов он поглощает, тем больше раздувается его тело. Милсери сдувается, когда уровень его энергии падает. (Pokémon Scarlet)

Когда на него нападают, он набрасывается на врага и покрывает его кремом. Пока противник ослеплён или ошеломлён вкусом, Милсери убегает. (Pokémon Violet)
cobblemon.species.alcremie.name: Алкрими
cobblemon.species.alcremie.desc:
Доверившись Тренеру, он угостит его ягодами, украшенными кремом. (Pokémon Sword)

Когда Алкрими доволен, крем, который он выделяет из своих рук, становится слаще и насыщеннее. (Pokémon Shield)

Десерты, украшенные кремом Алкрими, обладают насыщенным сладким вкусом и приносят счастье всем, кто их ест. (Pokémon Scarlet)

Алкрими, которых лелеяли, дают изысканный крем, поэтому Тренеры всегда растят их с любовью. (Pokémon Violet)
cobblemon.species.falinks.name: Фалинкс
cobblemon.species.falinks.desc:
Пятеро из них — солдаты, а один — руководитель. Приказы руководителя абсолютны. (Pokémon Sword)
